quotes.quote: A vacation is what you take when you can no longer take what you've been taking.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: When you go on vacation with people, you learn a lot about them.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: A good vacation is over when you begin to yearn for your work.
quotes.author: Morris Fishbein

quotes.quote: A vacation is having nothing to do and all day to do it in.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: A vacation trip is one-third pleasure, fondly remembered, and two-thirds aggravation, entirely forgotten.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Holidays: Two weeks on the sunny sands ? and the rest of the year on the financial rocks.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Vacations prove that a life of pleasure is overrated.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: In matters of healing the body or the mind, vacation is a true genius!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A vacation frequently means that the family goes away for a rest, accompanied by mother, who sees that the others get it.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: A vacation is a sunburn at premium prices.
quotes.author: Hal Chadwicke

quotes.quote: A vacation from school should not mean hunger for our children.
quotes.author: Dina Titus

quotes.quote: A vacation is like love: anticipated with pleasure, experienced with discomfort, and remembered with nostalgia.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Few vacations are as gratifying as those devoted to personal growth.
quotes.author: Pat Koch Thaler

quotes.quote: A vacation should be just long enough for the boss to miss you, and not long enough for him to discover how well he can get along without you.
quotes.author: Jacob Morton Braude

quotes.quote: Vacations are the coupons on the bonds of industry.
quotes.author: Harry Van Demark

quotes.quote: Vacations are necessities, not luxuries.
quotes.author: Linda Bloom

quotes.quote: To get away from one's working environment is, in a sense, to get away from one's self; and this is often the chief advantage of travel and change.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: It isn't how much time you spend somewhere that makes it memorable: it's how you spend the time.
quotes.author: David Brenner

quotes.quote: 'Vacation' means titillating my taste buds.
quotes.author: Brett Ratner

quotes.quote: The purpose of a vacation is to have the time to rest. But many of us, even when we go on vacation, don't know how to rest. We may even come back more tired than before we left.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: On vacation, you can wear all the colorful and casual clothing that you like, but you must always be elegant.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: It is not more vacation we need - it is more vocation.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A vacation spot out of season always has a very special magic.
quotes.author: Max Von Sydow

quotes.quote: No vacation goes unpunished.
quotes.author: Karl A. Hakkarainen

quotes.quote: When you are on vacation you will always miss your comfy bed. No matter where you go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Vacation: a period of travel and relaxation when you take twice the clothes and half the money you need.
quotes.author: Jerry Smith

quotes.quote: We hit the sunny beaches where we occupy ourselves keeping the sun off our skin, the saltwater off our bodies, and the sand out of our belongings.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: Isn't it amazing how much stuff we get done the day before vacation?
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If some people didn't tell you, you'd never know they'd been away on a vacation.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: An inactivated vaccine can be administered simultaneously or at any time before or after a different inactivated vaccine or live vaccine.
quotes.author: Stanley A. Plotkin

quotes.quote: Proper spacing of doses in a given vaccine series is essential for an optimal immune response.
quotes.author: Gary S. Marshall

quotes.quote: If we blow it out of proportion and we make sure we stockpile enough vaccine for everybody, then there's no incentive for them to use it. It will cost us a lot of money but we'll probably prevent it from happening. You can call it over-reacting, but it's buying insurance.
quotes.author: Michael Swetnam

quotes.quote: Vaccination evokes strong opinions and emotions. Some are grateful and relieved to get vaccines. Others are angry and resentful about vaccination mandates.
quotes.author: Louise Kho Habakus MA

quotes.quote: Vaccines are overwhelmingly safe and effective and the benefits vastly outweigh the risk.
quotes.author: Kim Mack Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Vaccines are the tugboats of preventive health.
quotes.author: William Foege

quotes.quote: Childhood vaccines are one of the great triumphs of modern medicine. Indeed, parents whose children are vaccinated no longer have to worry about their child's death or disability from whooping cough, polio, diphtheria, hepatitis, or a host of other infections.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.quote: Vaccines save lives; fear endangers them. It's a simple message parents need to keep hearing.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: Vaccines are a miracle; they're fantastic. Anything that makes people hesitate to give their children these vaccines according to the recommended schedule creates risk. Risk for the children who don't get vaccinated and risk for children, some of whom don't have an immune system, so they're benefiting from the fact that the community protection means the disease doesn't get to them.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Flu vaccine is far and away the most underutilized.
quotes.author: Paul A. Offit

quotes.quote: Vaccines are not traditionally big money makers. They're given once or a few times in one's life, so they're never going to be blockbusters.
quotes.author: Paul A. Offit

quotes.quote: There are always potential side effects for every vaccine.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.quote: Vaccines are extremely well tested; their safety is well understood. The false allegations about vaccines causing autism have been disproven. But there are still echoes out there confusing people.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Vaccines don't cause autism. Vaccines, instead, prevent disease. Vaccines have wiped out a score of formerly deadly childhood diseases. Vaccine skepticism has helped to bring some of those diseases back from near extinction.
quotes.author: Alex Pareene

quotes.quote: A vaccine introduces a small amount or a tempered version of the virus into the body - just enough to that the body is able to recognize it and deal with it when it encounters it again in the future.
quotes.author: Eula Biss

quotes.quote: Imagine the action of a vaccine not just in terms of how it affects a single body, but also in terms of how it affects the collective body of a community.
quotes.author: Eula Biss

quotes.quote: The best vaccine imaginable is only valuable to the extent we get it to everyone who needs it.
quotes.author: Seth Berkley

quotes.quote: Vaccines are the most cost-effective health care interventions there are. A dollar spent on a childhood vaccination not only helps save a life, but greatly reduces spending on future healthcare.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.quote: Only 'false prophets' suggest that vaccines may cause disorders like autism.
quotes.author: Kim Mack Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Vaccination choice is a human right.
quotes.author: Kim Mack Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Vaccines are epidemic— they have spread rapidly and extensively to almost all children and to many adults in the United States and around the world.
quotes.author: Kim Mack Rosenberg

quotes.quote: A country that requires all children to receive a product— no matter how beneficial— knowing that some children will die and others' lives will be destroyed by the use of that product, risks losing all moral authority.
quotes.author: James Turner

quotes.quote: Vaccines saves children's lives, make families safer, and have helped me be a better doctor.
quotes.author: Paul Thomas MD

quotes.quote: Vaccines that contain aluminum will not be effective without it.
quotes.author: Paul Thomas MD

quotes.quote: The thing is I think vaccines are one of the greatest medical breakthroughs that we have. I'm a big fan and a great fan of the history of the development of the smallpox vaccine, for example.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: Thimerosal is a mercury-based preservative that was in many American vaccines until 2003. It was removed from many of the pediatric vaccines, but it was put in the flu vaccine, which is now given to 53 million Americans.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy Jr

quotes.quote: I think that the discoveries of antibiotics and vaccines have contributed to the improvement of the quality of life, making it possible to prevent contagious diseases.
quotes.author: Shinya Yamanaka

quotes.quote: When the government controls a limited supply, the government gets to decide who gets the vaccines and who doesn't. In some cases, who lives and who doesn't.
quotes.author: Trish Regan

quotes.quote: I do not trust those who make the vaccines, or the apparatus behind it all to push it on us through fear.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: The risks are far greater to your child of not getting immunized than any kind of speculative potential relationship between the vaccine and the development of autism.
quotes.author: Irwin Redlener

quotes.quote: People cannot leave a creed alone; though it is the essence of a creed to be clear. But neither can they leave a legend alone; though it is the essence of a legend to be vague.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Every book which admits that evil is real is felt in some vague way to be admitting that good is unreal.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Mysticism is generally felt vaguely to be itself vague— a thing of clouds and curtains, of darkness and concealing vapors, of bewildering conspiracies, or impenetrable symbols.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Mysticism is generally felt vaguely to be itself vague— a thing of clouds and curtains, of darkness and concealing vapors, of bewildering conspiracies, or impenetrable symbols.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I never said a word against eminent men of science. What I complain of is a vague popular philosophy, which supposes itself to be scientific when it is really nothing but a sort of new religion and an uncommonly nasty one.
quotes.author: Grant

quotes.quote: Vagueness is at times an indication of nearness to a perfect truth.
quotes.author: Charles Ives

quotes.quote: Valuation is vague and arbitrary, when there is no assurance that it will be generally acquiesced in by others.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste Say

quotes.quote: Vague statements are interchangeable.
quotes.author: Robert Mager

quotes.quote: Vague expression permits the hearer to imagine whatever suits him and what he already thinks in any case.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: A vague uncritical idealism always lends itself to ridicule and too much of it might be a danger to mankind, leading it round in a futile wild-goose chase for imaginary ideals.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Vagueness and procrastination are ever a comfort to the frail in spirit.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Vague and mysterious forms of speech, and abuse of language, have so long passed for mysteries of science; and hard or misapplied words with little or no meaning have, by prescription, such a right to be mistaken for deep learning and height of speculation, that it will not be easy to persuade either those who speak or those who hear them, that they are but the covers of ignorance and hindrance of true knowledge.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Vaguely is not like clearly; nakedness is not like leather.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: For beauty is intangible, vague, ill to be defined; / She hath a coat of a chameleon, changing while we watch it; / Strangely woven is the web, disorderly yet harmonious, / A glistening robe of mingled mesh, that may not be unravelled.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Rich in the present, though poor in the past, / I yearn for the future, vague and vast; / And lo what treasure of glorious things / Giant futurity sheds from his wings.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: While constitutional provisions for the legislative branch are described in meticulous detail, the American Constitution is rather vague and ambiguous on the subject of presidential powers.
quotes.author: Joslyn Pine

quotes.quote: Although we all have the sense of having a mind and of existing, our understanding of our mind and how we exist is generally vague and confused.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Many predictions are so vague that it is always possible to say that they came true in some sense.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: The powers of the letters, when they were applied to a new language, must have been vague and unsettled, and therefore different hands would exhibit the same sound by different combinations.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is well-known how intensely older children suffer from vague and undefined fears, as from the dark, or in passing an obscure corner in a large hall,etc.
quotes.author: Anthony Sampson

quotes.quote: Before heaven and earth had taken from all was vague and amorphous. Therefore it was called the Great Beginning.
quotes.author: Congjie Liang

quotes.quote: Far better an approximate answer to the right question, which is often vague, than an exact answer to the wrong question, which can always be made precise.
quotes.author: John W. Turkey

quotes.quote: Let not ambition mock their useful toil, / Their homely joys, and destiny obscure; / Nor grandeur hear with a disdainful smile, / The short and simple annals of the poor.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: And even should the cloud of barbarism and despotism again obscure the science and liberties of Europe, this country remains to preserve and restore light and liberty to them.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: It is the vague and elusive. Meet it and you will not see its head. Follow it and you will not see its back
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: The famous saudade of the Portuguese is a vague and constant desire for something that does not and probably cannot exist, for something other than the present, a turning towards the past or towards the future; not an active discontent or poignant sadness but an indolent dreaming wistfulness.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: As for a future life, every man must judge for himself between conflicting vague probabilities.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Spirituality is a vague realization of relating to a supernatural cosmos.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Sanity is simply a state of a vague mind.
quotes.author: Mecha Constantine

quotes.quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: It makes little difference how many university courses or degrees a person may own. If he cannot use words to move an idea from one point to another, his education is incomplete.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Sometimes you find out what you are supposed to be doing by doing the things you are not supposed to do.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Don't just get involved. Fight for your seat at the table. Better yet, fight for a seat at the head of the table.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: As you start your journey, the first thing you should do is throw away that store-bought map and begin to draw your own.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than finding your course as you believe you bob aimlessly in the current. Wouldn't you know that your path was there all along, waiting for you to knock, waiting for you to become. This path does not belong to your parents, your teachers, your leaders, or your lovers. Your path is your character defining itself more and more everyday like a photograph coming into focus.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: You can't control how smart you are, how funny you are, how good-looking you are. The one thing you can control in your life is how hard you work.
quotes.author: Ian Brennan

quotes.quote: And now go, and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for your being here.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: For the most important decisions in your life, trust your intuition, and then work with everything you have, to prove it right.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: When people tell you not to believe in your dreams, and they say "Why?", say "Why not?"
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. You can't get there by bus, only by hard work and risk and by not quite knowing what you're doing, but what you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover will be yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Girls are more academically powerful. They make the grades, they run the student activities, they are the valedictorians.
quotes.author: Christina Hoff

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is the most exciting opportunity we have. But we have one shot. You graduate from college once, and that's it. You're going out of that nest. And you have to find that courage that's deep, deep, deep in there. Every step of the way.
quotes.author: Andrew Shue

quotes.quote: Graduation speeches force you to reflect. They are about consciousness. Nothing is better than consciousness.
quotes.author: Bruce Eric Kaplan

quotes.quote: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Commencement speeches were invented largely in the belief that outgoing college students should never be released into the world until they have been properly sedated.
quotes.author: Garry Trudeau

quotes.quote: Not only can you not plan the impact you're going to have, you often won't recognize it when you're having it.
quotes.author: Dick Costolo

quotes.quote: Thankfully dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses. So whatever your dream is right now, if you don't achieve it, you haven't failed, and you're not some loser. But just as importantlyâ€”and this is the part I may not get right and you may not listen toâ€”if you do get your dream, you are not a winner.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: I encourage you to live with life. Be courageous, adventurous. Give us a tomorrow, more than we deserve.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: That diploma you hold in your hands today is really just your learner's permit for the rest of the drive through life. Remember, you don't have to be smarter than the next person, all you have to do is be willing to work harder than the next person.
quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: For many, graduation marks the end of formal student life - the end of long spring breaks and of thinking that a 10 A.M. class is far too early.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: We all go through life bristling at our external limitations, but the most difficult chains to break are inside us.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: We're not just gathered here on a lovely May day in an ordinary auditorium at SF state. We're all strapped in, seated together on a gigantic ball whirling around the sun at 67,000 miles per hour, nested in a galaxy hurtling through the depths of space and time at 1.3 million miles per hour.
quotes.author: Kirk Schneider

quotes.quote: Graduation is a time of completion, of finishing, of an ending, however, it is also a time of celebration of achievement and a beginning for the new graduate.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: No graduation speaker will ever tell you that the future is anything but uncertain. It never is. But graduations need not only be obsessed with looking ahead; a graduation can be a day on which we turn back and trace our steps to see how we ended up where we are.
quotes.author: Taylor Mali

quotes.quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is the poet's holiday.
quotes.author: Ted Kooser

quotes.quote: Without Valentine's Day, February would be...well, January.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Idealizing the reality of past romances won't do you any favors as you face Valentine's Day alone.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: People love in different ways. You may have a man who brings you flowers every Monday but doesn't give two hooty-hoots about Valentine's Day. Just because he doesn't give you a valentine doesn't mean he doesn't love you!
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: When I got old enough to date, I realized that Valentine's Day is just a commercial marketing scam to make men feel bad. So I let my boyfriends off the hook.
quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

quotes.quote: Oh! if it be to choose and call thee mine, / Love, thou art every day my Valentine.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: Today is Valentine's Day--or, as men like to call it, Extortion Day!
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: I hate Valentine's day. It is a day for nothing but disappointment.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is one of those tricky celebrations where you're damned if you do and damned if you don't. If you love it, you're buying into a holiday created to sell greeting cards, bad bouquets, and shoddy love-themed stuffed animals. And if you're opposed to it, you're considered lonely and single and have clearly never had a valentine.
quotes.author: Dan Levy

quotes.quote: The best thing about Valentine's Day is that if you don't have a lover, you badly remember to get one!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is a time to celebrate the joy of being in love. Unless you're single and lonely then it's called Laundry Day.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is definitely one of those days where it's either awesome or it's a downer.
quotes.author: Judah Friedlander

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day: the holiday that reminds you that if you don't have a special someone, you're alone.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is the hardest day of the year for a woman to get out, but everybody who is anybody and single is out that night.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is the day all singletons like me dread.
quotes.author: Michelle McManus

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is like Armistice Day--you declare a truce.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day itself, like most holidays in the modern era, has been heavily influenced by commercialism that focuses on the appeal of romantic fantasies.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Any guy hates Valentine's Day. Even if you're in love, you can't win on Valentine's Day. If you're married, you can't win on Valentine's Day. Valentine's Day is like the thing you want to avoid at all costs.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is much more of a holy day of obligation for a guy in a relationship with a woman, because a woman has certain emotional expectations. Even if she doesn't value Valentine's Day, or views it as a corporate exercise, she still often wants her boyfriend or husband to go through the motions, just in case she values it.
quotes.author: Dan Savage

quotes.quote: Valentine's Day is a perfect time to reject the idea that the ideal man is taller, richer, more knowledgeable, more renowned, or more powerful.
quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

quotes.quote: To me, Valentine's Day is not merely limited to a lover but speaks of universal love.
quotes.author: Dimple Kapadia

quotes.quote: Now when arrows don't penetrate, see / Cupid grabs the pistol / He shoots straight for your heart/ Now, and he won't miss you!
quotes.author: Andre Benjamin

quotes.quote: Before you look for validation in others, try and find it in yourself.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: Nothing is as empowering as real-world validation, even if it's for failure.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: If you get validation from outside, then suddenly everything you do at home is justified.
quotes.author: Anurag Kashyap

quotes.quote: The logic of validation allows us to move between the two limits of dogmatism and skepticism.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Validation comes to us in two ways: through trials we overcome, and through the words of older men.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: Family is the place where acceptance and validation are most needed, but often the hardest to find.
quotes.author: Bill Crawford

quotes.quote: If self-validation were our most significant societal measure - we would give trophies to ourselves.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Look inside, without anyone else's validation understand that you are valuable, talented, unique, and worthy.
quotes.author: Joe Sacco

quotes.quote: When you lose need and take away the demand for validation you remain free of approval from the outside world.
quotes.author: Tammy Wooster

quotes.quote: You're learning to be nourished by the love you give, not by the validation offered in response to your giving.
quotes.author: Matthew Kahn

quotes.quote: As Buddha points out, you should not rely on the opinions of others for validation of your internal progression.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The only permission, the only validation, and the only opinion that matters in our quest for greatness is our own.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: What makes people weak? Their need for validation and recognition, their need to feel important. Don't get caught in this trap.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: That you will feel the validation of your external beauty but also get to the deeper business of being beautiful inside. There is no shade to that beauty.
quotes.author: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.quote: When we are looking for validation, that will never satisfy us. When we are looking for affection, for love, a little bit of that will be enough to be complete.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.quote: An amazing thing happens when you stop seeking approval and validation: You find it. People are naturally drawn like magnets to those who know who they are and cannot be shaken!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: For me, that's one of the best validations as an artist. To have a stranger come up to you and say that something you've created and put out there in the world has had some sort of impact on other people's lives.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: We have to recognise that the validation of identity comes through relationships we have and what we produce.
quotes.author: Eva Cox

quotes.quote: An artist doesn't necesetharily have to get acclaim from the outside. Maybe it is much better if he can get validation from within.
quotes.author: Aaron Rose

quotes.quote: Everybody is looking for validation, no matter who you are, and I think that's a need of the human condition - to look for affection or recognition or validation.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.quote: Don't wait on approval, validation and likes from others - always give yourself the highest of approval ratings and work from there. Hold your head up and be fabulous no matter what!
quotes.author: Jody Watley

quotes.quote: Women have to learn where their true source of validation is.
quotes.author: Maureen Murdock

quotes.quote: Mountaintops are for views and inspiration, but fruit is grown in the valleys.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Only if you have been in the deepest valley, can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Plains and valleys look more beautiful for those who have no hope of the summits!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Mountaintops inspire leaders but valleys mature them.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I have a dream that one day every valley shall be exalted, every hill and mountain shall be made low, the rough places will be made straight and the glory of the Lord shall be revealed and all flesh shall see it together.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Some look at the hills from far away and see only the barren lands; some travel amongst the hills and find the most beautiful valleys!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to reach the peak, but there is no growth on the top of a mountain. It is in the valley that we slog through, the lush grass and rich soil, learning and becoming what enables us to summit life’s next peak.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: If we never go through any valleys how will we know when we've reached a mountain top? How will we know if the mountain is even any good if all our lives we stay up on the mountain and never experience any valleys? I know we'd all like to avoid those 'valleys' at all costs, but the most growth for anything happens during adversity.
quotes.author: Kim Bloomer

quotes.quote: In the latter years of your life, your happiness and your self-esteem will be determined by the mountains you surmounted, the valleys you climbed out of, and the life and/or career that you forged for yourself.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: A valley that offers true solitude can provide an exhilarating experience for the soul. Just don't go in there alone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When you are in the valley, keep your goal firmly in view and you will get the renewed energy to continue the climb.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Every crag and gnarled tree and lonely valley has its own strange and graceful legend attached to it.
quotes.author: Douglas Hyde

quotes.quote: Yosemite Valley, to me, is always a sunshine, a glitter of green and golden wonder in a vast edifice of stone and space.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Even God cannot make two mountains without a valley in between.
quotes.author: Gaelic Proverb

quotes.quote: Act in the valley so that you need not fear those who stand on the hill.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: May the countryside and the gliding valley streams content me. Lost to fame, let me love river and woodland.
quotes.author: Virgil Publius Vergilius Maro

quotes.quote: Follow both: the call of the mountain of enlightenment and the temptation of the valley of experience. No mountain without valley, no valley without mountain.
quotes.author: Stefan Emunds

quotes.quote: We've climbed the mighty mountain. I see the valley below, and it's a valley of peace.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: We can only climb the mountains because there’s a valley that makes the mountain a mountain.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Study how water flows in a valley stream, smoothly and freely between the rocks. Also learn from holy books and wise people. Everything – even mountains, rivers, plants and trees – should be your teacher.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Mountains, trees, valleys, rivers and the purity they give you calmness and peace and peace to your soul as nature does. And that's the reason why I'm in love with nature...And once you fall in love with nature then no other person on material can attract you.
quotes.author: Ashok Rathod

quotes.quote: Down through the middle of the valley flows the crystal Merced, River of Mercy, peacefully quiet, reflecting lilies and trees and the onlooking rocks; things frail and fleeting and types of endurance meeting here and blending in countless forms, as if into this one mountain mansion Nature had gathered her choicest treasures, to draw her lovers into close and confiding communion with her.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Nature, like a loving mother, is ever trying to keep land and sea, mountain and valley, each in its place, to hush the angry winds and waves, balance the extremes of heat and cold, of rain and drought, that peace, harmony, and beauty may reign supreme.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Staton

quotes.quote: The little hills rejoice on every side. The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even against the greatest of odds, there is something in the human spirit- a magic blend of skill, faith, and valor- that can lift men from certain defeat to incredible victory.
quotes.author: Walter Lord

quotes.quote: Valor consists in the power of self recovery.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The hero is valorous because he stands up to every threat directed against his values. Heroism requires value conflict.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Real valor consists not in being insensible to danger; but in being prompt to confront and disarm it.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: True valor is like honesty; it enters into all that a man sees and does.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Valor is the soldier's adornment.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: It is a brave act of valor to condemn death, but where life is more terrible than death it is then the truest valor to dare to live.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Bravery is believing in yourself, and that thing nobody can teach you.
quotes.author: El Cordobes

quotes.quote: True valor lies between cowardice and rashness.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Valor is the contempt of death and pain.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Live your life that the fear of death can never enter your heart.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.quote: For souls nobly born, valor doesn't await the passing of years.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Valor would cease to be a virtue, if there were no injustice.
quotes.author: Agesilaus

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at its testing point.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Valor is stability not of legs and arms but of courage and the soul.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Valor is abased by too much loftiness.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: He who has resolved to conquer or die is seldom conquered; such noble despair perishes with difficulty.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: It is held that valor is the chiefest virtue, and most dignifies the haver.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The valor that struggles is better than the weakness that endures.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: True bravery is shown by performing without witness what one might be capable of doing before all the world.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: When it comes time to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with the fear of death, so when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.quote: Take Chances, Make Mistakes, That's How You Grow. Pain Nourishes Your Courage. You Have To Fail In Order To Practice Being Brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Valor consists in the power of self-recovery, so that a man cannot have his flank turned, cannot be out-generalled, but put him where you will, he stands.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The only step that makes the valuable to become valueless is the negative side of your eyes that you use to see it.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A value is valuable when the value of value is valuable to oneself.
quotes.author: Dayananda Saraswati

quotes.quote: The most valuable moments and experiences that life has to offer are found only along its most treacherous paths.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: The valuable person in any business is the individual who can and will cooperate with others.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Everything is valuable under the right conditions. To a man dying of thirst, water be more precious than gold. To a drowning man, water be of little worth and great trouble.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded the individual.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One of the most valuable things any person can learn is the art of using the knowledge and experience of others.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: An advice is truly valuable when people not just give it their ears but also their obedience.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Every valuable human being must be a radical and a rebel, for what he must aim at is to make things better than they are.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: The most valuable person is the one who cherishes the value in others.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: The most valuable possession you can own is an open heart. The most powerful weapon you can be is an instrument of peace.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: The desire to learn is valuable, but the desire for an education is priceless.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The really valuable method of thought to arrive at a logically coherent system is intuition.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most valuable treasure God has entrusted a shepherd with, is his sheep. No sheep is perfect but if shepherd despises them or adopts a scornful outlook for them then he has already began his downward plunge into faith which if He does not repent instantly, may eventually find himself warring against God himself who is our Good Shepherd.
quotes.author: Santosh Thankachan

quotes.quote: The most valuable of all human possessions, next to a superior and disdainful air, is the reputation of being well to do. Nothing else so neatly eases one's way through life, especially in democratic countries.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Your value doesn't decrease based on someone's inability to see your worth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only real valuable thing is intuition.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most valuable things in life are priceless. They are courage, compassion, wisdom, respect for ourselves and others, and a host of characteristics that we call the beauty of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: The strength of the vampire is that people will not believe in him.
quotes.author: Garrett Fort

quotes.quote: We enjoy the night, the darkness, where we can do things that aren't acceptable in the light. Night is when we slake our thirst.
quotes.author: William Hill

quotes.quote: To make you a vampire they have to suck your blood. And then you have to suck their blood. It's like a whole big sucking thing.
quotes.author: Buffy

quotes.quote: The vampire is an outsider. He's the perfect metaphor for those things. He's someone who looks human and sounds human, but is not human, so he's always on the margins.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: A starving child is a frightful sight. A starving vampire, even worse.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Vampires can live a very long time, theoretically forever, which means their idea of getting down to business can be damn leisurely.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: If vampires ever spend less time playing theatrics and living down to their stereotypes, they might actually take over the world someday.
quotes.author: Carrie Vaughn

quotes.quote: With vampires, there is such a great tradition that you suddenly find yourself a part of. Each generation reinvents what that means to them.
quotes.author: Michael Sheen

quotes.quote: Evil is like a Vampire. When you take arms against it and destroy it, you find in the end that you are evil too-that it is living on your own actions.
quotes.author: Denis Johnston

quotes.quote: Becoming a vampire means completely changing your identity.
quotes.author: Park Chan-wook

quotes.quote: There are vampires and vampires, and not all of them suck blood.
quotes.author: Fritz Leiber

quotes.quote: Bring a vampire around, people start discovering religion.
quotes.author: Richard Laymon

quotes.quote: Let the flesh instruct the mind.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Into every generation comes a vampire.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: Vampire doesn’t see his image. Even less in the holy water.
quotes.author: Charles De Leusse

quotes.quote: And everybody dreams about vampires; we grow up dreaming about them. They're the first and worst monster that lives under everybody's bed.
quotes.author: Robin McKinley

quotes.quote: The vampire was real. It was only that his true story had never been told.
quotes.author: Richard Matheson

quotes.quote: Vampires are people too. They've got their own problems, they just drink blood.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: Even bipolar vampires needed sleep from time to time, and he was well past his recommended safe dosage of stress.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: A vampire is very easy; you just take a very good-looking actor, put some teeth on them, make them pale, and you're there.
quotes.author: David Hayter

quotes.quote: A vampire may play with his food, but he never sets it free.
quotes.author: Pamela Palmer

quotes.quote: If you are a vampire, then a vampire is not the creature of the legends.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: Vampires, real vampires, didn't nibble on the necks of nubile young virgins. They tore people to pieces and sucked the blood out of the chunks.
quotes.author: David Wellington

quotes.quote: Vampires bore a grudge longer than any technically living creatures, and whenever they were in a bad temper, they expressed themselves through murder.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: A big tree attracts the gale.
quotes.author: Chinese (on pride)

quotes.quote: All that glitters is not gold.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Clean your finger before you point at my spots.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Clothes don't make the man.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Clouds that thunder, do not always rain.
quotes.author: Armenian (on vanity and arrogance)

quotes.quote: Empty vessels make the most sound.
quotes.author: John Lydgate

quotes.quote: Every ass loves to hear himself bray.
quotes.author: English (on vanity and arrogance)

quotes.quote: His bark is worse than his bite.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: If someone gives you advice, it is in his own interest.
quotes.author: Tunisian Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better to enjoy the cool breeze of others waving your flag, than to suffer the sweat of doing it yourself.
quotes.author: L.D. Seese

quotes.quote: It is better to light one candle than to curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: No one can make us feel inferior without our consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The cat would eat fish but would not get her feet wet.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: The drum makes a great fuss because it is empty.
quotes.author: Trinidadian (on vanity and arrogance)

quotes.quote: The fly on the water buffalo's back thinks he is taller than the water buffalo.
quotes.author: Tagalog (Filipino)(on vanity and arrogance)

quotes.quote: The wise through excess of wisdom is made a fool.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Vanity blossoms but bares no fruit.
quotes.author: Nepalese (on vanity and arrogance)

quotes.quote: Never underestimate a man who overestimates himself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Cure yourself of the affliction of caring how you appear to others. Concern yourself only with how you appear before God, concern yourself only with the idea that God may have of you.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: There was never yet fair woman but she made mouths in a glass.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: They say that hens do cackle loudest when there is nothing vital in the eggs they have laid.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Our vanity is the constant enemy of our dignity.
quotes.author: Madame Anne Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: There are no grades of vanity, there are only grades of ability in concealing it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Vanity is often the unseen spur.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: There is nothing so agonizing to the fine skin of vanity as the application of a rough truth.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Vanity is so secure in the heart of man that everyone wants to be admired - even I who write this, and you who read this.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Vanity is the quicksand of reason.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Vanity plays lurid tricks with our memory.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: in eating ecology love murder vegan vegetarianism flesh eating is unprovoked murder.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Being vegan helped me realize I can say and do what I believe is right. That's powerful.
quotes.author: Alicia Silverstone

quotes.quote: Being a vegan just helps me build up my self-esteem. I feel good about it every time I eat a meal.
quotes.author: Steve-O

quotes.quote: Anyone who cares about the Earth - really cares - must stop eating animals.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.quote: No animals needs to die in order for me to live. And that makes me feel good.
quotes.author: Howard Lyman

quotes.quote: When you adopt a vegan diet we make a connection, you don't go back, it is not a diet, it is a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Freelee Frugivore

quotes.quote: Being vegan doesn't make you a stronger, better athlete. But it allows you to make yourself a stronger, better athlete.
quotes.author: Brendan Brazier

quotes.quote: A vegetarian is a person who won't eat anything that can have children.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: People eat meat and think they will become strong as an ox, forgetting that the ox eats grass.
quotes.author: Pino Caruso

quotes.quote: I'm a vegan. I respect the environment and I do my best to spread the importance of such an issue.
quotes.author: Jared Leto

quotes.quote: By eating meat we share the responsibility of climate change, the destruction of our forests, and the poisoning of our air and water. The simple act of becoming a vegetarian will make a difference in the health of our planet.
quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nháº¥t Háº¡nh

quotes.quote: It costs us so little to go vegan. It costs animals so much if we don't.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: Vegetarianism is harmless enough, though it is apt to fill a man with wind and self-righteousness.
quotes.author: Robert Hutchison

quotes.quote: I dream of a vegan world - that's where I want everything to go.
quotes.author: Gene Baur

quotes.quote: Any serious social, political, and economic change must include veganism.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: One can be a vegan and eating a health-promoting, high-nutrient diet, but one can also eat a small amount of animal products while following a Nutritarian diet and still live a long, healthy life.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Becoming vegan is the most important and direct change we can immediately make to save the planet and its species.
quotes.author: Chris Hedges

quotes.quote: I've been vegan for about 10 and a half years. It's been all good. I'm obviously much healthier
quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

quotes.quote: Every time you drink a glass of milk or eat a piece of cheese, you harm a mother. Please go vegan.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: I grew up in cattle country-that's why I became a vegetarian. Meat stinks, for the animals, the environment, and your health.
quotes.author: K.DLang

quotes.quote: Being a vegan is pretty easy these days, as almost every town and city has health food stores and vegetarian-friendly restaurants.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: Vegetarianism is a way of living consciously on the planet.
quotes.author: Amy Smart

quotes.quote: You cannot live a nonviolent life as long as you are consuming violence. Please consider going vegan.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: A vegan diet is one of the best things you can do for your health and the well being of our planet.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: There is something about veganism that is not easy, but the difficulty is not inherent in veganism, but in our culture.
quotes.author: Will Tuttle

quotes.quote: Being vegan just gives you such great karma.
quotes.author: Alicia Silverstone

quotes.quote: We all love animals. Why do we call some 'pets' and others 'dinner?'
quotes.author: K. D. Lang

quotes.quote: I thought a vegan diet would be too difficult, being on the road so much, but it's been far easier than I thought.
quotes.author: Michelle Forbes

quotes.quote: I try to stick to a vegan diet heavy on fruit and vegetables.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: I am a vegan because I don't want to support the cruel industry that goes on on farms everyday.
quotes.author: Zoe Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Las Vegas, Nevada: A city where oddities don't make you lame, but instead bring you riches and fortune and fame.
quotes.author: Walter Wykes

quotes.quote: Vegas embodies every brash, joyous cliché about the U.S. that the rest of the world hopes might be true.
quotes.author: Mark Ellwood

quotes.quote: Vegas is the most extreme and allegorical of American settlements, bizarre and beautiful in its venality and in its devotion to immediate gratification.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Many a man who goes to Las Vegas to get away from it all soon finds that Las Vegas gets it all away from him.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Las Vegas was and is a hard town that will make you pay for your inability to restrain your desires.... If you have a weakness, Las Vegas will punish you.
quotes.author: Hal Rothman

quotes.quote: Las Vegas: A Savage Journey to the Heart of the American Dream
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Seriously, why tour the world when all you have to do is visit Las Vegas and see all the highlights in one location?
quotes.author: Jeff Maguire

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is a feast or famine kind of city.
quotes.author: Kevin Raiford

quotes.quote: Vegas must be a great town for Laundromats. Nobody lives there, everybody is just passing through, leaving a little bit of dirt.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: There's really only one constant in Las Vegas and that's change.
quotes.author: Travis Hoium

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is the most honest fake city in the world.
quotes.author: Frank Scoblete

quotes.quote: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas ... but that doesn't matter when you live there.
quotes.author: Michelle Madow

quotes.quote: While I was busy hating Vegas, and hiding from Vegas, a funny thing happened. I grew to love Vegas.
quotes.author: J. R. Moehringer

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is the boiling pot of entertainment.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is a city built on hopes, dreams, and a little bit of crazy.
quotes.author: Michael Mcdonald

quotes.quote: It's hard to imagine a bigger desert oasis than Las Vegas.
quotes.author: Cinnamon Stomberger

quotes.quote: If you aim to leave Las Vegas with a small fortune, go there with a large one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For a loser, Vegas is the meanest town on earth.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is the only place I know where money really talks--it says, Goodbye.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is a very strange place. It's a place of broken dreams.
quotes.author: Concha Buika

quotes.quote: Vegas means comedy, tragedy, happiness and sadness all at the same time.
quotes.author: Artie Lange

quotes.quote: Las Vegas, the most expensive toilet in the world that still can't flush.
quotes.author: Brin-Jonathan Butler

quotes.quote: Las Vegas is the suicide capital of America ... and not everyone who comes here leaves here. Sometimes, what happens in Vegas truly stays in Vegas.
quotes.author: Paul W. Papa

quotes.quote: Vegas is a celebration.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.quote: In Las Vegas, nothing ends very well.
quotes.author: Walter Wykes

quotes.quote: If you know how to live in Vegas you can have the best time.
quotes.author: Tony Curtis

quotes.quote: What happens in Vegas, I'm telling everyone.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: Everything and anything you want to do, you can do in Las Vegas.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Vegas is the answer, no matter the question.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's just no quiet in Vegas.
quotes.author: Barry Manilow

quotes.quote: Accepting your own mortality is like eating your vegetables: You may not want to do it, but it's good for you.
quotes.author: Caitlin Doughty

quotes.quote: A vegetable garden in the beginning looks so promising and then after all little by little it grows nothing but vegetables, nothing, nothing but vegetables
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Vegetables deplete soil. They're extractive. If soil has a bank account, vegetables make the largest withdrawals.
quotes.author: Dan Barber

quotes.quote: The only way to get vegetables at a diner late night is to order the omelette. A feta cheese and broccoli omelette.
quotes.author: Lisa Loeb

quotes.quote: Vegetables are interesting but lack a sense of purpose when unaccompanied by a good cut of meat.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: It must be hard to cook if you anthropomorphisize your vegetables.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Vegetables, herbs and spices. If you can combine those ingredients, that would be the best dish you'd ever cook!
quotes.author: Rinrin Marinka

quotes.quote: Vegetables are something God invented to let women get even with their children.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: The essential quality of an animal is that it seeks its own living, whereas a vegetable has its living brought to it
quotes.author: Henry Mayhew

quotes.quote: If you get vegetables in season, the difference is remarkable compared to vegetables that might have been imported. You can't beat fresh ingredients and seasonal fresh ingredients. There's nothing quite like the taste of a beautiful summer strawberry.
quotes.author: William Katt

quotes.quote: Let the fresh fruits and vegetables be your guide, and make something that will keep for the whole week.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Without civilization, we would not turn into animals, but vegetables.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: My passion is about motivating as many families as possible to learn about vegetables and healthy eating together.
quotes.author: Jennie Garth

quotes.quote: If there is one vegetable which is God-given, it is the haricot bean.
quotes.author: Jean-Henri Fabre

quotes.quote: If you have never tasted a braised vegetable, you'll find it is a revelation.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Vegetables contain more nutriment than an equal amount of dead flesh. This will sound a surprising and incredible statement to many people, because they have been brought up to believe that they cannot exist unless they defile themselves with flesh, and this delusion is so widely spread that it is difficult to awaken the average man from it.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Leadbeater

quotes.quote: No vegetable exists which is not better slightly undercooked.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: He who has never envied the vegetable has missed the human drama.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: If home cooks shopped in their own vegetable bin before going to the market, they would save money and help the environment, too, and all because they decided to rescue a vegetable before it turned bad.
quotes.author: Dana Cowin

quotes.quote: The difference of a single day is perceptible. Vegetables can only be tasted in perfection, gathered the same day.
quotes.author: John Pintard

quotes.quote: Artichoke: That vegetable of which one has more at the finish than at the start of dinner.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: You can eat a lot more vegetables than you can cotton candy. Bring on the veggies. Stay away from the fluffy carbs.
quotes.author: Stephen Furst

quotes.quote: They say that vegetable food is not sufficiently nutritious. But chemistry proves the contrary. So does physiology. So does experience....And again: the largest and strongest animals in the world are those which eat no flesh-food of any kind - the elephant and the rhinoceros.
quotes.author: R. Trall

quotes.quote: Facts must be faced. Vegetables simply don't taste as good as most other things do.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: When the fuel is dried up in a vehicle, it stops driving automatically. You are a vehicle in the spiritual and the physical world, so you need some oil for alacrity, in order to get to your destination. The greater the quantity of your oil, the more you cover the distance, and the more you cover the distance, the closer you get to your success.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: If you have no good drive in you, your life will not be steered through a good direction. It will miss its destined station. Passion or drive is what moves the vehicle of a fulfilled life.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The left-hand lane is exclusively for the use of Porsches, BMWs and Mercedes. Dark-coloured vehicles only please. If you're driving a white or silver car please stick to the middle lane at all times and moderate your speed. Loser!
quotes.author: Cathy Dobson

quotes.quote: Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Your body is a vehicle of your emotions and a vehicle of feelings and a vehicle of whatever you need to get done in life. And you've got to take care of that vehicle.
quotes.author: Eva Longoria

quotes.quote: The Porsche was just a vehicle to get to another place. I used it to change people's perceptions of me. I had grown up really middle class. USC was filled with elitists, richies who would go skiing every weekend. So I pretended like I was part of that world - to be accepted.
quotes.author: Brian Grazer

quotes.quote: A bus is a vehicle that runs twice as fast when you are after it as when you are in it
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The helicopter approaches closer than any other vehicle to fulfillment of mankind's ancient dreams of the flying horse and the magic carpet.
quotes.author: Igor Sikorsky

quotes.quote: Mechanical excellence is the only vehicle of genius.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Transcendental meditation is like a car, a vehicle that allows you to go within. It's a mental technique.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Music has that ability to be a magical thing, and I was like, maybe music is the vehicle that transports us to that other world.
quotes.author: Zack Snyder

quotes.quote: Connected vehicle technologies are revolutionizing and democratizing transportation for safer, smarter, more responsible, and more accessible driving.
quotes.author: Dinesh Paliwal

quotes.quote: Intent and action are the fuel and vehicle in the journey of creation.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The vehicles will be self-driving. So you have your own person space where you can sit back and relax.
quotes.author: John Krafcik

quotes.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Love should be a vehicle allowed to travel without limitations.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: The fastest manned vehicle in history was Apollo 10. It reached 25,000 mph.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Vengeance to God alone belongs; But, when I think of all my wrongs My blood is liquid flame!
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Vengeance is God's job, not ours.
quotes.author: F. LaGard Smith

quotes.quote: Part of me wants justice for this. Part of me wants to never cause harm to another.
quotes.author: Ken Scholes

quotes.quote: The city guardsmen were like the keres, doom-bringers of merciless vengeance.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: A tardy vengeance shares the tyrant's guilt.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Vengeance taken will often tear the heart and torment the conscience.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: And though the villain 'scape a while, he feels. Slow vengeance, like a bloodhound, at his heels.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: To treat a man with kindness rather than vengeance is the way to move him. Vengeance may break his spirit; but kindness will break his heart.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: For vengeance is an emptiness and he that seeketh it wasteth himself.
quotes.author: Jeffery Farnol

quotes.quote: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Vengeance cannot abide the agony of grace.
quotes.author: Anne Elisabeth Stengl

quotes.quote: In high vengeance there is noble scorn.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I'm not violent, I don't believe in killing people, but standing up for yourself, speaking out against injustice, is another form of vengeance.
quotes.author: Eva Gabrielsson

quotes.quote: Vengeance is mine; I will repay.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Vengeance is not the point; change is. But the trouble is that in most people's minds the thought of victory and the thought of punishing the enemy coincide.
quotes.author: Barbara Deming

quotes.quote: There was a time when metal ruled the world and I don't see any reason why it should be different now.
quotes.author: Zacky Vengeance

quotes.quote: When critics sit in judgment it is hard to tell where justice leaves off and vengeance begins.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: Vengeance is sweet. Vengeance taken when the vengee isn't sure who the venger is, is sweeter still.
quotes.author: Gary D. Schmidt

quotes.quote: Vengeance has no foresight.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The thirst for vengeance was the beautiful nature which Homer imitated.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Hamann

quotes.quote: Retribution often means that we eventually do to ourselves what we have done unto others.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Just vengeance does not call for punishment.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Vengeance is in my heart, death in my hand, blood and revenge are hammering in my head.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: One good act of vengeance deserves another.
quotes.author: John Jefferson

quotes.quote: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Vengeance is one of life's great motivators.
quotes.author: K.S. Brooks

quotes.quote: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The paradox of vengefulness is that it makes men dependent upon those who have harmed them, believing that their release from pain will come only when they make their tormentors suffer.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.quote: Vengeance is a form of reciprocity in which each deed begets another. Each act of vengeance is a response to a previous wrong.
quotes.author: James T. Siegel

quotes.quote: Venom first made his appearance some years ago in a Spider-Man book, and was a huge best-seller.
quotes.author: Peter Milligan

quotes.quote: To be a satirist, at all events. The venom of Pope is what is needed. The sense of delight -- the expansion and the compassion of Shakespeare is no good at all for that. He is a bad comic.
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: There are poisons that blind you, and poisons that open your eyes.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Poison and medicine are often the same thing, given in different proportions.
quotes.author: Alice Sebold

quotes.quote: The more hidden the venom, the more dangerous it is.
quotes.author: Margaret of Valois

quotes.quote: A man's venom poisons himself more than his victims.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: Snakes are sometimes perceived as evil, but they are also perceived as medicine. If you look at an ambulance, there's the two snakes on the side of the ambulance. The caduceus, or the staff of Hermes, there's the two snakes going up it, which means that the venom can also be healing.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: Snake's poison is life to the snake; it is in relation to man that it means "death.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It's all just venom to the soul and symptomatic of a larger issue: the idea of the shortcut. The result without the fight. The fight is the thing. The work.
quotes.author: Daniel Gillies

quotes.quote: Poison is in everything, and no thing is without poison. The dosage makes it either a poison or a remedy.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: The venom clamours of a jealous woman poison more deadly than a mad dog's tooth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Remember, it is not the snake bite that kills, but the venom which circulates afterwards that is fatal. Do not let the snake bite of another person release any venom inside of you. You can control its entry and you are responsible for every thought in your mind.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Venom was a band that strongly influenced the image and the idea behind Slayer.
quotes.author: Tom Araya

quotes.quote: All things are poisons, for there is nothing without poisonous qualities. It is only the dose which makes a thing poison.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: The poisons are our principal medicines, which kill the disease and save the life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Venus favors the bold.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: There is good evidence that Venus once had liquid water and a much thinner atmosphere, similar to Earth billions of years ago. But today the surface of Venus is dry as a bone, hot enough to melt lead, there are clouds of sulfuric acid that reach a hundred miles high and the air is so thick it's like being 900 meters deep in the ocean.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: We don't know that Venus had oceans, but there's every reason to believe it did.
quotes.author: David Greenspoon

quotes.quote: As a young planet, Venus was losing hydrogen rapidly to space. The oceans boiled off, and after some period of time, perhaps 600 million years, there was no surface water.
quotes.author: David Greenspoon

quotes.quote: There are so many stars shining in the sky, so many beautiful things winking at you, but when Venus comes out, all the others are waned, they are pushed to the background.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Venus smiles not in a house of tears.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: That's Venus, September thought. She was the goddess of love. It's nice that love comes on first thing in the evening, and goes out last in the morning. Love keeps the light on all night.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Be bold: Venus herself aids the stout-hearted.
quotes.author: Tibullus

quotes.quote: Venus can see at night without eyes.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: She is a mortal danger to all men. She is beautiful without knowing it, and possesses charms that she's not even aware of. She is like a trap set by nature - a sweet perfumed rose in whose petals Cupid lurks in ambush! Anyone who has seen her smile has known perfection. She instills grace in every common thing and divinity in every careless gesture. Venus in her shell was never so lovely.
quotes.author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quotes.quote: Venus herself, if she were bold, would not be Venus.
quotes.author: Apuleius

quotes.quote: It's no longer a warmth hidden in my veins: it's Venus entire and whole fastening on her prey.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: Love seldom haunts the breast where learning lies, And Venus sets ere Mercury can rise.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Venus yields to caresses, not to compulsion.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: From Venus, the goddess of love, this word refers to the reality of desire. With the rise of Protestantism and science, the word disease was tacked on in a revealing combination of categorization and moralizing. The disease of love.
quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

quotes.quote: An occultation of Venus is not half so difficult as an eclipse of the sun, but because it comes seldom the world thinks it's a grand thing.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Throughout the ages, stories with certain basic themes have recurred over and over, in widely disparate cultures; emerging like the goddess Venus from the sea of our unconscious.
quotes.author: Joan de Vinge

quotes.quote: Venus, when her son was lost, Cried him up and down the coast, In hamlets, palaces, and parks, And told the truant by his marks,- Golden curls, and quiver, and bow.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Twere sin to stain fair Venus' courts with blood
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Joy may you have and gentle hearts content Of your loves couplement: And let faire Venus, that is Queene of love, With her heart-quelling Sonne upon you smile.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: Venus is not so beautiful all naked, alive, and panting, as she is here in Virgil.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: All things of the sea belong to Venus; pearls and shells and alchemists' gold and kelp and the riggish smell of neap tides, the inshore green, and purple further out and the joy of distances and the roar of falling masonry, all these are hers, but she doesn't come out of the sea for all of us.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: Venus, a beautiful, good-natured lady, was the goddess of love.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Mother of Rome, delight of Gods and men, Dear Venus that beneath the gliding stars Makest to teem the many-voyaged main And fruitful lands- for all of living things Through thee alone are evermore conceived, Through thee are risen to visit the great sun- Before thee, Goddess, and thy coming on, Flee stormy wind and massy cloud away, For thee the daedal Earth bears scented flowers, For thee waters of the unvexed deep Smile, and the hollows of the serene sky Glow with diffused radiance for thee.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The atmosphere of Venus consists of ammonia, sulfur, and nitric oxide. Man must have lived there once.
quotes.author: Andrei Brie

quotes.quote: Venus, the white queen, the universal matrix, Down to the molecular hexagons and carbon-chains.
quotes.author: Kathleen Raine

quotes.quote: Now, Venus is an extremely hostile environment, and as such presents a lot of challenges for a science fiction author who wants to create life there.
quotes.author: Sarah Zettel

quotes.quote: All the sea-gods are dead. You, Venus, come home To your salt maidenhead.
quotes.author: Allen Tate

quotes.quote: Fair Venus shines even in the eve of day, with sweetest beam propitious shines, and shakes a trembling flood of softened radiance from her dewy locks.
quotes.author: Anna Letitia Barbauld

quotes.quote: The words with which a child's heart is poisoned, whether through malice or through ignorance, remain branded in his memory, and sooner or later they burn his soul.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Some guys like to undermine a girl's self-esteem with little verbal jabs. Eventually it all adds up. One bee sting doesn't hurt a horse, but enough bee stings can kill a horse.
quotes.author: Oliver Gaspirtz

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is not a form on entertainment.
quotes.author: J. E. Brown

quotes.quote: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but your words they'll destroy me.
quotes.author: Cassandra Giovanni

quotes.quote: Bless people when they revile you. Think how much good they are doing by helping to stamp out the false ego.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: By continually scolding someone, they in time become accustomed to it and despise your reproof.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Rash and incessant scolding runs into custom and renders itself despised.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The pleasure we feel in criticizing robs us from being moved by very beautiful things.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: To vilify a great man is the readiest way in which a little man can himself attain greatness.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Vilify, Vilify, some of it will always stick.
quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

quotes.quote: There is nobody so weak of invention that he cannot make up some little stories to vilify his enemy.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The bitter clamour of two eager tongues.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: They have vilified me, they have crucified me; yes, they have even criticized me.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.quote: Abusive language and swearing are a legacy of slavery, humiliation, and disrespect for human dignity, one's own and that of other people.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Let us consider that swearing is a sin of all others peculiarly clamorous, and provocative of Divine judgment.
quotes.author: Isaac Barrow

quotes.quote: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Well you seemed too busy to call him a prat and I thought someone should.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Putting someone down with name calling reveals your own low self-esteem.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: I guess name-calling is your only attack; because you're too weak to challenge me any other way.
quotes.author: Goku

quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I admit that invective is one of my pleasures. This only brings me problems in life, but that's it. I attack, I insult. I have a gift for that, for insults, for provocation. So I am tempted to use it.
quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.quote: I've slipped on occasion into the realm of irresponsible invective, but I try to avoid it and generally recant when I fall short. Because name-calling does nothing to improve understanding or move the political debate forward.
quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

quotes.quote: Invective may be a sharp weapon, but overuse blunts its edge. Even when the denunciation is just and true it is an error of art to indulge it too long.
quotes.author: John Tyndall

quotes.quote: For evil deeds may better than bad words be borne.
quotes.author: Spenser
