quotes.quote: The foolish and wicked practice of profane cursing and swearing is a vice so mean and low that every person of sense and character detests and despises it.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I simply do not think that yelling, swearing, threatening or belittling will get you to the place you want to be faster than kindness, understanding, patience and a little willingness to compromise.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.quote: If verbal abuse had consequences, it would stop right now.
quotes.author: J. E. Brown

quotes.quote: The less versatile you are, the better you have to be at what you do well.
quotes.author: Bill Belichick

quotes.quote: Life is the most versatile thing under the sun; and in the pursuit of life and character the author who works in a groove works in blinkers.
quotes.author: Laurence Housman

quotes.quote: The idea of recognizing your strengths and using them in as versatile a way as you can is cool to me.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: My talents fall within definite limitations. I am not as versatile an actress as some think.
quotes.author: Greta Garbo

quotes.quote: That's what I like about film-it can be bizarre, classic, normal, romantic. Cinema is to me the most versatile thing.
quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.quote: My style is super versatile and doesn't pertain to any one category. It can be best compared to a mood ring. It is very dependent on the mood I am feeling for the day.
quotes.author: Melina Matsoukas

quotes.quote: It's important for any player to be versatile enough to be able to play in different positions.
quotes.author: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain

quotes.quote: An actor tries to be versatile, to immerse himself in a different culture.
quotes.author: Jimmy Smits

quotes.quote: I'm pretty versatile. I'm able to adapt to an environment and the way I view things based on who I'm with.
quotes.author: Jake T. Austin

quotes.quote: Life is about being a versatile athlete and training in all realms of life.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: Everybody thinks if you do one thing, you can't do something else. So I like the fact that I can be versatile if I want to.
quotes.author: Denise Van Outen

quotes.quote: But the guitar, when you think about it, is the most versatile, really. I mean you can pick it up and take it with you wherever you go.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: There's nothing I have more of in my closet than little white dresses. They're versatile and elegant, but sexy in a feminine way. And then I'll have a bit more fun with accessories - like a pair of neon sandals.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: Make your wardrobe as versatile as an actress. It should be able to play many roles.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Animation can explain whatever the mind of man can conceive. This facility makes it the most versatile and explicit means of communication yet devised for quick mass appreciation.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: It's so important for jewelry to be versatile. The statement piece is no longer just that. One day it's a statement and the next it's merely an accent to a great pair of shoes or a stunning handbag. Adaptability is key.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: I want my handbags and my shoes to be stylish but I want to make sure that they're versatile. I travel and I have to make sure the pieces I put into my bag can go with a dress or with shorts or jeans.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: For me, brunch is such a versatile meal since you can play on both the sweet and savory in your dishes.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Every veteran is a hero.
quotes.author: Joe Walsh

quotes.quote: A veteran journalist has never had time to think twice before he writes.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: As a combat veteran, I know the cost of war.
quotes.author: Tulsi Gabbard

quotes.quote: Experts often possess more data than judgment.
quotes.author: General Colin Powell

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who has found out by his own painful experience all the mistakes that one can make in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Make three correct guesses consecutively and you will establish a reputation as an expert.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: If an expert says it can't be done, get another expert.
quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

quotes.quote: An expert knows all the answers - if you ask the right questions.
quotes.author: Levi Strauss

quotes.quote: An expert is one who knows more and more about less and less.
quotes.author: Nicholas Butler

quotes.quote: Even when the experts all agree, they may well be mistaken.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: My definition of an expert in any field is a person who knows enough about what's really going on to be scared.
quotes.author: P. J. Plauger

quotes.quote: An expert is someone who tells you why you can't do something.
quotes.author: Alec Issigonis

quotes.quote: An expert is someone who knows a lot about the past.
quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

quotes.quote: Our veterans accepted the responsibility to defend America and uphold our values when duty called.
quotes.author: Bill Shuster

quotes.quote: Experts should be on tap but never on top.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The young are adept at learning, but even more adept at avoiding it.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who avoids the small errors while sweeping on to the grand fallacy.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: An expert gives an objective view. He gives his own view.
quotes.author: Morarji Desai

quotes.quote: There are no lazy veteran lion hunters.
quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quotes.quote: More importantly, if you are in a position to hire, hire a veteran. They will be the best employees you have.
quotes.author: Eric Shinseki

quotes.quote: An expert is someone who has succeeded in making decisions and judgements simpler through knowing what to pay attention to and what to ignore.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Never become so much of an expert that you stop gaining expertise. View life as a continuous learning experience.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: An expert is someone who knows some of the worst mistakes that can be made in his subject, and how to avoid them.
quotes.author: Werner Karl Heisenberg

quotes.quote: Believe one who has proved it. Believe an expert.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: An expert is a man who tells you a simple thing in a confused way in such a fashion as to make you think the confusion is your own fault.
quotes.author: William Castle

quotes.quote: An expert is the one who predicts the job will take the longest and cost the most.
quotes.author: Arthur Bloch

quotes.quote: An expert gossiper knows how much to leave out of a conversation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are all experts in our own little niches.
quotes.author: Alex Trebek

quotes.quote: There is no expert on what happiness is but many on what it might have been.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The only war is the war you fought in. Every veteran knows that.
quotes.author: Allan Keller

quotes.quote: The willingness with which our young people are likely to serve in any war, no matter how justified, shall be directly proportional to how they perceive the Veterans of earlier wars were treated and appreciated by their nation.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: In war, there are no unwounded soldiers.
quotes.author: José Narosky

quotes.quote: To be a veteran, one must know and determine one's price for freedom.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: On this Veterans Day, let us remember the service of our veterans, and let us renew our national promise to fulfill our sacred obligations to our veterans and their families who have sacrificed so much so that we can live free.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.quote: A veteran is someone who, at one point in his/her life wrote a blank check made payable to 'The United States of America' for an amount of 'up to and including my life.' That is Honor, and there are way too many people in this country who no longer understand it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In the beginning of a change the patriot is a scarce man, and brave, and hated and scorned. When his cause succeeds, the timid join him, for then it costs nothing to be a patriot.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Duty, honor, country. those threeHallowed Words reverently dictate what you ought to be, what you can be, what you will be.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: The soldier Above all other's pray's for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest Wounds scars of war.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: For the veteran, thank you for bravely doing what you're called to do so we can safely do what we're free to do.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Soldiers generally win battles; generals get credit for them.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys. Look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death!
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: When our perils are past, shall our gratitude sleep?
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Honor to the soldier and sailor everywhere, who bravely bears his country's cause. Honor, also, to the citizen who cares for his brother in the field and serves, as he best can, the same cause.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: America's Veterans have served their country with the belief that democracy and freedom are ideals to be upheld around the world.
quotes.author: John Doolittle

quotes.quote: Old soldiers never die; they just fade away.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: We owe our World War II veterans - and all our veterans - a debt we can never fully repay.
quotes.author: Doc Hastings

quotes.quote: The most persistent sound, which reverberates through men's history, is the beating of war drums.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Damn the wars but bless the soldier.
quotes.author: T.L. Moffitt

quotes.quote: You'd have to go a long way to find someone who was more proud and grateful for what our veterans have done for all of us.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: Without heroes, we are all plain people, and don't know how far we can go.
quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

quotes.quote: Caring for veterans shouldn't be a partisan issue. It should an American one.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.quote: Some people live an entire lifetime and wonder if they have ever made a difference in the world, but the Marines don't have that problem.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: In the aftermath, we are because they were.
quotes.author: RJ Heller

quotes.quote: The more we sweat in peace the less we bleed in war.
quotes.author: Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit

quotes.quote: Anyone who has ever looked into the glazed eyes of a soldier dying on the battlefield will think hard before starting a war.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
quotes.author: Elmer Davis

quotes.quote: They may take away our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.quote: Freedom is never free.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
'Are you a doctor?' Li said.
'I’m better than that. I’m a vet. Vets do everything: brain surgery, heart surgery, lab analysis, dislocations'.
quotes.author: Matthew Reilly

quotes.quote: For some, being a vet was a means to make a living. For Theo, helping animals was a photo of his soul, the coat of his will.
quotes.author: Steven James Taylor

quotes.quote: If I could stomach the awful part of being a veterinarian, which involves sticking your hand up animals' behinds, I would be a vet.
quotes.author: Allison Janney

quotes.quote: As a veterinarian and lover of animals, I feel the time is now to stop the practice of horse soring for good.
quotes.author: Ted Yoho

quotes.quote: I wanted to be a veterinarian until I saw a video of a vet performing surgery on a dog. Then I decided I wanted to be a pianist.
quotes.author: Amy Lee

quotes.quote: And I.O.U. for veterinarian services / For feeding every lost dog that I dragged home at the end of the rope, / And for healing the pains of puppy love.
quotes.author: Dave Concoran

quotes.quote: When I grow up maybe I'll be a veterinarian / I'll take care of little animals / Like ponies and parakeets / And I'll give them food to eat / And the puppies go "yip, yip, yip" / And the kitties go "meow, meow, meow" / And thank you veterinarian
quotes.author: Tift Merrit

quotes.quote: I wanted to be / A Veterinarian / To save this planet / And every living thing / It's funny how things change
quotes.author: Jonathan Boone

quotes.quote: It requires no argument to prove the necessity and the high importance of the veterinary branch of the medical profession.
quotes.author: University of Pennsylvania. School of Veterinary Medicine

quotes.quote: It becomes evident that in the immediate future the veterinary profession must receive full honorable recognition, must have its claim for adequate endowments and foundations admitted and answered.
quotes.author: University of Pennsylvania. School of Veterinary Medicine

quotes.quote: Veterinary medicine does not need to apologize for its past; it has passed through the same stages of empiricism and quasi-science through which modern human medicine has more slowly toiled, has overcome the same popular prejudices, and is now participating in equal honor and equal reward.
quotes.author: University of Pennsylvania. School of Veterinary Medicine

quotes.quote: Veterinary medical profession contributes in diverse ways, from developing drugs and protecting the food supply to treating companion animals and investigating animal diseases in the wild.
quotes.author: National Research Council

quotes.quote: Then I realized that my passion for animals and veterinary industry now had an outlet entirely compatible with my personal desire to work with people who were suicidal.
quotes.author: Nadine Hamilton

quotes.quote: When you ask a veterinarian about their job most will answer along the lines that it is rewarding, but challenging and demanding career.
quotes.author: Nadine Hamilton

quotes.quote: Many vets will happily recount a childhood passion for animals or a childhood pet that led them to eventually pursuing a career as a vet.
quotes.author: Nadine Hamilton

quotes.quote: Veterinarians have long been considered the guardians of animal welfare and health.
quotes.author: Nadine Hamilton

quotes.quote: While it is undeniable that the veterinary profession has made many important contributions to both human and animal health, one wonders what other contributions could have been made by a more diverse and inclusive profession.
quotes.author: Lisa M. Greenhill

quotes.quote: As a matter of fact it takes a much cleverer man to be a really good animal-doctor than it does to be a good people's doctor.
quotes.author: Tara Chadha

quotes.quote: Veterinarians are experts, but they are not all-knowing. Veterinarians spend a lot of time talking with the people closest to their patients.
quotes.author: Josh Hestermann

quotes.quote: Vets also need to show a passion for helping animals.
quotes.author: Josh Hestermann

quotes.quote: A vets job can be a difficult one thanks to long hours, high-stress situations, and the inevitable loss of some patients.
quotes.author: Josh Hestermann

quotes.quote: Keeping animals happy and healthy is a special privilege for vets, vet techs, and their entire team.
quotes.author: Josh Hestermann

quotes.quote: Part of being a veterinarian or any other type of zoologist is helping to better the zoology community.
quotes.author: Josh Hestermann

quotes.quote: Veterinary practice, of course, has its sad life. Animals are totally vulnerable: they are dependent on us, and it is unforgivable to let them down.
quotes.author: Robert M. Miller

quotes.quote: Working with animals, despite the regular contretemps, adds up to a rewarding and fulfilling life, which is confirmed by the fact that most vets seem to be happy men.
quotes.author: Robert M. Miller

quotes.quote: The best doctor in the world is the veterinarian. They can't ask their patients what is the matter - they've got to just know.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Good veterinarians talk to animals. Great veterinarians hear them talk back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The positive vibrations of unregulated joy, peace, happiness and tranquility is freedom.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Control your vibrations to be the master of the own harmony.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Vibrations are vital for our planet's progression / In order to move forward / Feel the singular life force of the world
quotes.author: Andrew Edward Lucier

quotes.quote: The learned compute that seven hundred and seven millions of millions of vibrations have penetrated the eye before the eye can distinguish the tints of a violet. What philosophy can calculate the vibrations of the heart before it can distinguish the colours of love?
quotes.author: Pisistratus Caxton

quotes.quote: When things are going on that have a strong vibration--what foreign correspondents love to call a "repercussion"--they cause a good deal of mind-quaking.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The emotion you feel is always about the vibrational variance between where you want to be and where you are. If you’re out of balance, there are only two ways to bring yourself into alignment: Either raise your expectation to match your desire -or lower your desire to match your expectation.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: It is your vibrational thoughts that give life to the goals you wish for.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: When the prayer becomes the vibration of the mind and self, then we can create a miracle.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Offer a vibration that matches your desire rather than offering a vibration that keeps matching what-is.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: The world is never quiet, even its silence eternally resounds with the same notes, in vibrations which escape our ears. As for those that we perceive, they carry sounds to us, occasionally a chord, never a melody.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Whatever you're feeling is what you're vibrating and what you're vibrating is what you're attracting.
quotes.author: Lynn Grabhorn

quotes.quote: Every good thought, every good word, every good emotion, and every act of kindness, is lifting the vibration of your being to new heights. And as you begin to raise your vibration, a new life and a new world will reveal itself to you.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Every human brain is both a broadcasting and receiving station for the vibration of thought.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Only when the clamor of the outside world is silenced will you be able to hear the deeper vibration. Listen carefully.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: They say sound is vibration and it got my mind shaking/ Can you feel it vibrating? I call it Vibe Ratings.
quotes.author: Capital Steez

quotes.quote: In every man’s heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Deep within vibration ripples, as if on a silver line, connecting me to the One, Who, to the five senses roars, but to the spirit inside gently whispers, "Be not afraid, you are Mine."
quotes.author: Donka Kristeva

quotes.quote: It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters.
quotes.author: Aditi Rathore via Twitter

quotes.quote: To destroy an undesirable rate of mental vibration, concentrate on the opposite vibration to the one suppressed.
quotes.author: Khemetic Saying

quotes.quote: Objects and names and forms are but the expression of vibrations in different aspects. Even all that we call matter or substance, and all that does not seem to speak or sound - it is all in reality vibration.
quotes.author: Hazrat Khan

quotes.quote: Spoken words are sounds occasioned by the vibrations of thoughts; thoughts are vibrations sent forth by the ego or by the soul. Every word you utter should be potent with soul vibration. A man's words are lifeless if he fails to impregnate them with spiritual force.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Vices...all in us. Some hidden, some obvious, some convicted to death. Sometimes helping, sometimes destroying. Comes and goes. But they always stays. In our veins. In our brain. Our sweet adrenaline and struggle. Continuously. To make us feel the fake vivid life. Vices...
quotes.author: Viorica Dragotel

quotes.quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Vices are simply the errors which a man makes in his search after his own happiness. Unlike crimes, they imply no malice toward others, and no interference with their persons or property.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.quote: The greatest temptations are not those that solicit our consent to obvious sin, but those that offer us great evils masking as the greatest goods.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Thus, a good man, though a slave, is free; but a wicked man, though a king, is a slave. For he serves, not one man alone, but what is worse, as many masters as he has vices.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: It is good to be without vices, but it is not good to be without temptations.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: No company is preferable to bad. We are more apt to catch the vices of others than virtues, as disease is far more contagious than health.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To love a woman for her virtues is meaningless. She's earned it, it's a payment, not a gift. But to love her for her vices is a real gift, unearned and undeserved. To love her for her vices is to defile all virtue for her sake - and that is a real tribute of love, because you sacrifice your conscience, your reason, your integrity and your invaluable self-esteem.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Men are more easily governed through their vices than through their virtues.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Vices are sometimes only virtues carried to excess!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Vices are simply the errors which a man makes in his search after his own happiness.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.quote: The problem with people who have no vices is that generally you can be pretty sure they're going to have some pretty annoying virtues.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: There is no vice so simple but assumes some mark of virtue on his outward parts.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We tolerate without rebuke the vices with which we have grown familiar.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Half the vices which the world condemns most loudly have seeds of good in them and require moderate use rather than total abstinence.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: There are vices which have no hold upon us, but in connection with others; and which, when you cut down the trunk, fall like the branches.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Think no vice so small that you may commit it, and no virtue so small that you may over look it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Vices are often habits rather than passions.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: Vices are those acts by which a man harms himself or his property. Crimes are those acts by which one man harms the person or property of another.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.quote: Accepting your vices and faults makes you more human. And far less likely to succeed.
quotes.author: Siddesh Sonawane

quotes.quote: Vicious habits are so great a stain to human nature, and so odious in themselves, that every person actuated by right reason would avoid them, though he were sure they; would be always concealed both from God and man, and had no future punishment entailed upon them.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Those who are in love with the present can be cruel and corrupt but not genuinely vicious. They cannot be methodically and consistently ruthless.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It is the most vicious of all crimes - to be abused by someone you had a relationship with! Because then you blame yourself.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Examples of vicious courses practiced in a domestic circle corrupt more readily and more deeply when we behold them in persons in authority.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Though theÂ viciousÂ can sometimes pour affliction upon the good, their power is transient and their punishment certain; and that innocence, though oppressed by injustice, shall, supported by patience, finally triumph over misfortune!
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: There is no one moreÂ viciousÂ on their own than conservative women on conservative women.
quotes.author: Nicolle Wallace

quotes.quote: The vicious result of privilege is that the creature who receives it becomes incapacitated by it as by a disease.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: But if you know that something has been really vicious, you don't read it, you don't let it into your head. What's damaging is when sentences go through your head and you burn with the injustice of it.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: Be virtuous and you will beÂ vicious.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: You may be as vicious about me as you please. You will only do me justice.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: The stupid thing about anger is how people hurt you and then you let them keep hurting you by being angry about how they originally hurt you. It's a vicious cycle.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: People can be really mean - they say the most vicious things.
quotes.author: Rutina Wesley

quotes.quote: You've got to be a little vicious. You've got to be narcissistic. You've got to be on fire about your career.
quotes.author: Howard Stern

quotes.quote: Each year oneÂ viciousÂ habit discarded, in time might make the worst of us good.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: ViciousÂ habits are so odious and degrading that they transform the individual who practices them into an incarnate demon.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: AÂ vicious circleÂ develops in which the people around you expect you to be there for them all the time and comply with their wishes.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: TheÂ vicious circleÂ of life is employmentÂ
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: He who makes war his profession cannot be otherwise than vicious. War makes thieves, and peace brings them to the gallows.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The problem is the people who tend to be the best organized are the most radical and the most vicious.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: The example alone of aÂ viciousÂ prince will corrupt an age; but that of a good one will not reform it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Men always grow vicious before they become unbelievers.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: TheÂ viciousÂ count their years; virtuous, their acts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: LittleÂ viciousÂ minds abound with anger and revenge and are incapable of feeling te pleasure of forgiving their enemies.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: If you hate your enemies, you will contract such a vicious habit of mind, as by degrees will break out upon those who are your friends, or those who are indifferent to you.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Reasonable andÂ viciousÂ are quite consistent with each other, in fact, only through their union are great and far-reaching crimes possible
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The subtlest and most vicious aspect of women's oppression is that we have been conditioned to believe we are not oppressed, blinded so as not to see our own condition.
quotes.author: Robin Morgan

quotes.quote: Take mankind in general, they are vicious-their passions may be operated upon.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Those whose character is mean and vicious will rouse others to animosity against them.
quotes.author: Xunzi

quotes.quote: Tis weak and vicious people who cast the blame on Fate. The right use of Fate is to bring up our conduct to the loftiness of nature.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Little vicious minds abound with anger and revenge and are incapable of feeling te pleasure of forgiving their enemies.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: When you're the victim of the behavior, it's black and white; when you're the perpetrator, there are a million shades of gray.
quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

quotes.quote: We are not a victim of our emotions or thoughts. We can understand our triggers and use them as tools to help us respond more objectively.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Thornton

quotes.quote: There are no victims, only volunteers.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: We're all victims of our own hubris at times.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: Victims make excuses. Leaders deliver results.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The victim of mind-manipulation does not know that he is a victim. To him, the walls of his prison are invisible, and he believes himself to be free
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: You are a victim only when you have decided to play the part.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Where victims see adversity, extreme achievers see opportunity.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The worst kind of victim was the kind that was aware of nothing.
quotes.author: B. Barmanbek

quotes.quote: The victim to too severe a law is considered as a martyr rather than a criminal.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: We're all victims of what life deals out. It's how we handle it that's important.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: We were not the victims of ancestor worship. We had the benefits of a fresh start.
quotes.author: Matthew D. Miller

quotes.quote: You can't play the role of a victim all your life without becoming one in the end.
quotes.author: Danilo Kis

quotes.quote: We become victims of the great disease of technological society - meaninglessness.
quotes.author: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.quote: We are not victims of the world we see, we are victims of the way we see the world.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: You are not a helpless victim of your own thoughts, but rather a master of your own mind.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: What hurts the victim most is not the cruelty of the oppressor, but the silence of the bystander.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The real victim of bigotry is the white man who hides his weakness under his myth of superiority.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: You become the victim of the past, and your tormentor today is your self left over from yesterday.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We are all victims of the violence that animals suffer... their liberation is also our liberation.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You are not a victim of your circumstance.Stay determine to endure hard times. No situation is permanent.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Victims of oppression & injustice don't need our spasm of passion....they need our legs & lungs of endurance.
quotes.author: Gary Haugen

quotes.quote: One victim lives in tragedy, another victim stops to stare, and still another walks on by pretending not to see
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: Don't become a victim of yourself. Forget about the thief waiting in the alley; what about the thief in your mind?
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Once trapped in the belief that you are a victim, you surrender your birthright to compete for the prizes of life.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: The victims of crime have been transformed into a group oppressively burdened by a system designed to protect them.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It is true that a victim who fights back may suffer for it, but one who does not almost certainly will suffer for it.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: As victims of hurt, we frequently don't bring up what ails us, because so many wounds look absurd in the light of day.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: We are all both victims and victimizers. Just as everyone suffers, no one is innocent of causing suffering themselves.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: We don't have to be victims of our past, that we can let go of our bitterness, and that all of us can achieve greatness.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Each victory with God can bring a reassurance once more that the ones born of God are victorious.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Where there is unity there is always victory.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: For victory in life, we've got to keep focused on the goal, and the goal is Heaven.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat for it is momentary.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The best victory is when the opponent surrenders of its own accord before there are any actual hostilitiesâ€¦It is best to win without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Victory is the beautiful, bright-colored flower. Transport is the stem without which it could never have blossomed.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The victory of success is half won when one gains the habit of setting goals and achieving them.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Victory is much more meaningful when it comes not just from one person, but from the joint achievements of many.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: The first place we must win the victory is in our own minds. If you don't think you can be successful, then you never will be.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The problems of victory are more agreeable than those of defeat, but they are no less difficult.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: This victory alone is not the change we seek; it is only the chance for us to make that change.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to those that believe in it the most and believe in it the longest.
quotes.author: Randall Wallace

quotes.quote: Victory goes to the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
quotes.author: Savielly Grigorievitch Tartakower

quotes.quote: The only victories which leave no regret are those which are gained over ignorance.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Yes, victory is sweet, but it doesn't necessarily make life any easier the next season or even the next day.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: It's a story about victory that will touch the lives of everyone who watches it. It's powerful.
quotes.author: Derek Luke

quotes.quote: Victories that are easy are cheap. Those only are worth having which come as the result of hard fighting.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The victory is always sweeter... winning things with friends.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: Victory is about recognizing all the work that went into achieving your dream.
quotes.author: Tommy Hilfiger

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The moment of victory is much too short to live for that and nothing else.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The victory over our inner self is a daily struggle. Be strong and do not give up.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Victory is won not in miles but in inches. Win a little now, hold your ground, and later, win a little more.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Victory isn't defined by wins or losses. It is defined by effort. If you can truthfully say, 'I did the best I could, I gave everything I had,' then you're a winner.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Schadler

quotes.quote: To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: If fighting is sure to result in victory, then you must fight, even though the ruler forbid it; if fighting will not result in victory, then you must not fight even at the ruler's bidding.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories.
quotes.author: Ken Venturi

quotes.quote: Video just accesses international information so much more readily.
quotes.author: Ann Macbeth

quotes.quote: Video is universal and allows people around the world to communicate and exchange ideas.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: Digital video is so beautiful. It's lightweight, modern, and it's only getting better. It's put film into the La Brea Tar Pits.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Videos are more like photography. It's not as much about trying to tell a story as it is creating images.
quotes.author: Tatyana Ali

quotes.quote: Video is freeing, but also lazier. You have to recreate the love of the moment.
quotes.author: Leos Carax

quotes.quote: Video is just one part of a marketing plan. It fits certain messages & people better than others.
quotes.author: Steve Garfield

quotes.quote: It is more difficult to manipulate with film than, for instance, video. The problem with video is that it gives you a thousand possibilities.
quotes.author: Lars Von Trier

quotes.quote: A good video can make all the difference.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: Video gives people a voice.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: Video is the most interesting and engaging way to share an idea with others.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: Videos? Videos are important because millions of people watch TV and we can only tour and play so many places. But if you've got a video, then you're able to air it and millions and millions of people will see it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.quote: The downside of videos is that it will put my vision in front of other people, so they might not get the chance to create their own.
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: Videos destroyed the vitality of rock and roll. Before that, music said, "Listen to me." Now it says, "Look at me."
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Sometimes videos make a bad song very tight.
quotes.author: Earl Sweatshirt

quotes.quote: Music videos are very concrete and rigid. They don't allow for emotional interaction.
quotes.author: Chris Milk

quotes.quote: Use video to train assistants you'll be surprised how quickly they learn.
quotes.author: Andrew Mayne

quotes.quote: Life is a video game. No matter how good you get, you are always zapped in the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The home videos aren't as good, but they are seeming to get better.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I think the long-term effect of video on cinema is good in that what we are now getting up there on the screen is of superior quality. Videos are just so much more sensitive to the world.
quotes.author: Ann Macbeth

quotes.quote: Videos have to go hand in hand with your music, so that's why, ultimately, they should be created by the artist. And if they're not, it doesn't really add up to me.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Video is moving online in a big way. It's proven to be a challenging market for some companies that start out as a pure Internet company such as Joost.
quotes.author: Niklas Zennstrom

quotes.quote: A delayed game is eventually good, a bad game is bad forever.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.quote: A picture is worth a thousand words and a video is worth a million pictures.
quotes.author: Ankala Subbarao

quotes.quote: An unwritten rule was born in recent years: every song must have a video on.
quotes.author: Florin Grozea

quotes.quote: Statistics show that musical videos are the most watched video materials.
quotes.author: Florin Grozea

quotes.quote: Technology is extraordinarily advance nowadays and TV quality video productions that cost tens of thousands of euros a few years ago can now be achieved.
quotes.author: Florin Grozea

quotes.quote: Many video stores sold popcorn and other cinema snacks.
quotes.author: Michael Z. Newman

quotes.quote: Americans no longer experience vacations. They simply Sony them so they can ignore them for the rest of the year.
quotes.author: John Graham

quotes.quote: The promise of computerized video had long been seen as democratizing and liberating.
quotes.author: Michael Z. Newman

quotes.quote: People tend to see what they want when they see video footage and it is not always the whole truth.
quotes.author: Jason Medina

quotes.quote: Life is a video game. No matter how good you get, you are always zapped in the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Steel wins battles. Gold wins wars.
quotes.author: Davion, the Dragon Knight

quotes.quote: Every lie contains the truth, and every truth contains a lie...
quotes.author: Shu from Suikoden II

quotes.quote: The obvious objective of video games is to entertain people by surprising them with new experiences.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.quote: Nothing is more badass than treating a woman with respect.
quotes.author: Mr. Torgue

quotes.quote: The world is born from zero. The moment that zero became one is the moment that world springs to life.
quotes.author: Metal Gear Solid 4

quotes.quote: In video games, one of the most helpless against injustice can even mighty.
quotes.author: Glenn Greenwald

quotes.quote: In the darkest hour, there is always a way out.
quotes.author: Eve, Mass Effect 3

quotes.quote: Video games are always half real.
quotes.author: Jesper Juul

quotes.quote: Video games are no substitute for real world pleasures (marriage, the birth of a child, spiritual enlightenment, what have you), but they do provide a nice reprieve from real world woes.
quotes.author: Brett Weiss

quotes.quote: Video games are bad for you? That's what they said about rock-n-roll.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.quote: Video games are engineered now, but the step I am trying to take, no one can engineer.
quotes.author: Bill Budge

quotes.quote: Video games are a huge, incredibly popular, worldÂ­transforming medium.
quotes.author: Austin Grossman

quotes.quote: I recently learned something quite interesting about video games. Many young people have developed incredible hand, eye, and brain coordination in playing these games. The air force believes these kids will be our outstanding pilots should they fly our jets.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: We cannot and will not ban the creation of violent video games. But, we can prevent the distribution of these disturbing games to children, where their effects can be negative.
quotes.author: Herb Kohl

quotes.quote: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

quotes.quote: One of the best lessons children learn through video games is standing still will get them killed quicker than anything else.
quotes.author: Jinx Milea

quotes.quote: The destructive effects of video games are not on boys' cognitive abilities or their reaction times, but on their motivation and their connectedness with the real world.
quotes.author: Leonard Sax

quotes.quote: Knowledge is useless if it is not used.
quotes.author: Gixx, Guild Wars 2

quotes.quote: Hope is what makes us strong. It is why we are here. It is what we fight with when all else is lost.
quotes.author: Pandora

quotes.quote: Death is inevitable. Our fear of it makes us play safe, blocks out emotion. It's a losing game. Without passion, you are already dead.
quotes.author: Max Payne

quotes.quote: One who knows nothing can't understand nothing .
quotes.author: Kingdon Hearts

quotes.quote: I believe love is the only entity that doesn't change over time.
quotes.author: Albert from Legend of Dragoon

quotes.quote: If there is truly evil in this world, it lies within the heart of mankind.
quotes.author: Edward D. Morrison

quotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
quotes.author: Chief

quotes.quote: Mess with the best, you will die like the rest.
quotes.author: Duke Nukem from Duke Nukem 3D

quotes.quote: We all make choices but in the end our choices make us.
quotes.author: Bioshock

quotes.quote: A man chooses, a slave obeys.
quotes.author: Bioshock

quotes.quote: Videogames are a little more work and they're a little more stilted.
quotes.author: Carlos Alazraqui

quotes.quote: It is really hard to make it convincing enough that you forget you are playing a video game.
quotes.author: Tim Page

quotes.quote: We tried to change Vietnam. Instead, Vietnam changed us.
quotes.author: Tony Thomson

quotes.quote: I'm very moved to be here today, ... Our lives are now much better, but Vietnam remains a very poor country. We need to work much harder.
quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

quotes.quote: I saw courage both in the Vietnam War and in the struggle to stop it. I learned that patriotism includes protest, not just military service.
quotes.author: John F. Kerry

quotes.quote: Matterhorn is my metaphor of the Vietnam War - we built it, we abandoned it, we assaulted it, we lost, and then we abandoned it again.
quotes.author: Karl Marlantes

quotes.quote: As I come to understand Vietnam and what it implies about the human condition, I also realize that few humans will permit themselves such an understanding.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Within the soul of each Vietnam veteran there is probably something that says "Bad war, good soldier." Only now are Americans beginning to separate the war from the warrior.
quotes.author: Max Cleland

quotes.quote: I would like to ask a question. Would this sort of war or savage bombing which has taken place in Vietnam have been tolerated for so long, had the people been European?
quotes.author: Indira Ghandi

quotes.quote: The biggest lesson I learned from Vietnam is not to trust our own government statements. I had no idea until then that you could not rely on them.
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: I know this: that in your own hearts and your own souls, you are as much responsible for the Vietnam War as I am for killing these people.
quotes.author: Charles Manson

quotes.quote: In Vietnam we have no political prisoners. No one is arrested or jailed for his or her speech or point of view. They are put in jail because they violated the law.
quotes.author: Nong Duc Manh

quotes.quote: Our purpose in Vietnam is to prevent the success of aggression. It is not conquest, it is not empire, it is not foreign bases, it is not domination. It is, simply put, just to prevent the forceful conquest of South Vietnam by North Vietnam.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: I do not believe that the men who served in uniform in Vietnam have been given the credit they deserve. It was a difficult war against an unorthodox enemy.
quotes.author: William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: When the United States fought in Vietnam, it was organized modern technology versus organized human beings, and the human beings won.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Our numbers have increased in Vietnam because the aggression of others has increased in Vietnam. There is not, and there will not be, a mindless escalation.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Vietnam was as much a laboratory experiment as a war.
quotes.author: John Pilger

quotes.quote: Vietnam was what we had instead of happy childhoods.
quotes.author: Michael Herr

quotes.quote: Vietnam, me love you long time. All day, all night, me love you long time.
quotes.author: Alex Garland

quotes.quote: The only important lesson from the Vietnam War is this, Democrats lose wars.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.quote: A country that has been through as much as Vietnam has to have some crazy music somewhere.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: All the wrong people remember Vietnam. I think all the people who remember it should forget it, and all the people who forgot it should remember it.
quotes.author: Michael Herr

quotes.quote: The crusades of Vietnam and Watergate seemed like a good idea at the time, even a noble one, not only to the press but perhaps to a majority of Americans.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Vietnam should remind all conservatives that whenever you put your faith in big government for any reason, sooner or later you wind up as an apologist for mass murder.
quotes.author: Karl Hess

quotes.quote: Vietnamese are very similar to the Chinese. They just can't sit on gold bars underneath their beds. Eventually, they will pull out their gold bars and invest.
quotes.author: Pham Nhat Vuong

quotes.quote: The South Vietnamese were perhaps a little bit slow in doing things, they jump on, on the problem and they try to do themselves everything. Or, they try to have some short cuts with the, those people they were dealing with.
quotes.author: Bui Diem

quotes.quote: The Vietnamese have a secret weapon. It's their willingness to die beyond our willingness to kill. In effect, they've been saying, You can kill us, but you'll have to kill a lot of us; you may have to kill all of us. And, thank heaven, we are not yet ready to do that.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: The true history of Vietnamese civilian suffering does not fit comfortably into America's preferred postwar narrative - the tale of a conflict nobly fought by responsible commanders and good American boys, who should not be tainted by the occasional mistakes of a few 'bad apples' in their midst.
quotes.author: Nick Turse

quotes.quote: The Vietnamese have a secret weapon. It's their willingness to die beyond our willingness to kill. In effect, they've been saying, you can kill us, but you'll have to kill a lot of us; You may have to kill all of us. And, thank heaven, we are not yet ready to do that.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: The Vietnamese people deeply love independence, freedom and peace. But in the face of United States aggression they have risen up, united as one man.
quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

quotes.quote: We have to reshape our own perception of how we view ourselves.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.quote: The universal view melts things into a blur.
quotes.author: Emile M Cioran

quotes.quote: Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Men are not afraid of things, but of how they view them.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: You get a wonderful view from the point of no return.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Don't borrow someone else's spectacles to view yourself with.
quotes.author: Simon Travaglia

quotes.quote: The conventional view serves to protect us from the painful job of thinking.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Our virtues and view spring from one root.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The hours we pass with happy prospects in view are more pleasing than those crowded with fruition.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Any view of things that is not strange, is false.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Never limit your view of life by any past experience.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Don't look back unless it's a good view.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: If you don't climb the mountain, you can't see the view.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: When everything feels like an uphill struggle, just think of the view from the top.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't try to fine tune someone else's view.
quotes.author: George H W Bush

quotes.quote: Looking back on things, the view always improves.
quotes.author: Walt Kelly

quotes.quote: Our perspectives on situations act like a lens through which we view the world.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: A world view is probably an expression of self.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: Sweet Auburn, loveliest village of the plain, / Where health and plenty cheered the labouring swain.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: A man he was to all the country dear, / And passing rich with forty pounds a year; / Remote from town he ran his Godly grace, / Nor e'er had changed nor wished to change his place.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The town and village, dome and farm, / Each give each a double charm, / As pearls upon an Ethiop's arm.
quotes.author: John Dyer

quotes.quote: Hardy went down to botanize in the swamp, while Meredith climbed towards the sun. Meredith became, at his best, a sort of daintily dressed Walt Whitman: Hardy became a sort of village atheist brooding and blaspheming over the village idiot.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A relatively primitive village in which there are still real feasts, common artistic shared expressions, and no literacy at all is more advanced culturally and more healthy mentally than our educated, newspaper-reading radio-listening culture.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A village is a hive of glass, where nothing unobserved can pass.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: It takes only one child to raze a village.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: Let the villages of the future live in our imagination, so that we might one day come to live in them!
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Our village life would stagnate if it were not for the unexplored forests and meadows which surround it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You need a village, if only for the pleasure of leaving it. A village means that you are not alone, knowing that in the people, the trees, the earth, there is something that belongs to you, waiting for you when you are not there.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Every village should celebrate its birthday & it will end the poison of casteism… and once casteism ends, see how the strength of villages increase!
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: It takes a village to raise a child.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Life in a Chinese village is much more organised because the Chinese Communist Party has a presence even in the remotest Chinese village - a presence of the kind that no governmental or non-governmental organisation has in Indian villages.
quotes.author: Pankaj Mishra

quotes.quote: You can pregrow a village with no consequence on the land. In fact, with a positive carbon contribution.
quotes.author: Mitchell Joachim

quotes.quote: Twenty men crossing a bridge, into a village, / Are twenty men crossing twenty bridges, into twenty villages, / Or one man crossing a single bridge into a village.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: I like the streets of New York City, where I was born, better than these streets of palms. No doubt, my father liked his village in Ukrainia better than the streets of New York City; and my grandfather the city and its synagogue, where he once read aloud the holy books, better than the village in which he dickered in the market-place.
quotes.author: Charles Reznikoff

quotes.quote: Under the spreading chestnut tree / The village smithy stands; / The smith a mighty man is he / With large and sinewy hands./ And the muscles of his brawny arms / Are strong as iron bands
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Villages unlike towns, have always been ruled by conformism, isolation, petty surveillance, boredom, and repetitive malicious gossip about the same families. Which is a precise enough description of the global spectacle's present vulgarity.
quotes.author: Guydebord

quotes.quote: The almighty dollar, the great object of universal devotion throughout our land, seems to have no genuine devotees in these peculiar villages.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: If you are culling out the swindlers, you may end up emptying the village.
quotes.author: Bengali Proverbs

quotes.quote: In one village, he is treated as a dog, in the other village he is God.
quotes.author: Bengali Proverbs

quotes.quote: In every little village in the world there are great potential champions who only need motivation, development, and good exercise evaluation.
quotes.author: Arthur Lydiard

quotes.quote: I love old bookshops and their accumulated dusty trash and treasures. I frequent them in any village, town, or city where I may be.
quotes.author: Helen Nearing

quotes.quote: At any village wedding, sitting near the bride and groom were two men, one noting down the contributions made to the groom's household, and the other, the bride's.
quotes.author: Mysore Narasimhachar Srinivas

quotes.quote: The village of Penicuik, with its neighbouring spinning mills, / Is most lovely to see, and the Pentland Hills; / And though of a barren appearance and some parts steep, / They are covered with fine pasture and sustain flocks of sheep.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: On the cheerful village green, / Skirted round with houses small, / All the boys and girls are seen, / Playing there with hoop and ball.
quotes.author: Jane Taylor

quotes.quote: I love those connections that make this big old world feel like a little village.
quotes.author: Gina Bellman

quotes.quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you would be known, and not know, vegetate in a village; if you would know, and not be known, live in a city.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Have you forgotten to have a beautiful breakfast in a countryside village? Then, you have forgotten the life!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Everyone says villains are thankless parts, but those are really the best roles.
quotes.author: Liev Schreiber

quotes.quote: A superhero movie is only as great as its villains.
quotes.author: Chadwick Boseman

quotes.quote: There are new words now that excuse everybody. Give me the good old days of heroes and villains, the people you can bravo or hiss. There was a truth to them that all the slick credulity of today cannot touch.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: As a person navigating the waters of public scrutiny, you are often unable to hold on to personal heroes or villains. Inevitably you will meet your hero, and he may turn out to be less than impressive, while your villain turns out to be the coolest cat you've ever met.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: Life is not simple, and people can't be boxed into being either heroes or villains.
quotes.author: Jessica Hagedorn

quotes.quote: Are people raised to be villains or vilified like I have become?
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: People think that my favorite roles to do are villains, but I find comedy to be the most challenging and rewarding.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.quote: Both villains and heroes need to have a steadfast belief in themselves.
quotes.author: Jack Gleeson

quotes.quote: Super villains and bad guys win in real life.
quotes.author: Colby Covington

quotes.quote: Shakespeare's villains are fabulous because none of them know that they are villains. Well, sometimes they do.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.quote: Every villian is a hero in his own mind.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: You can figure out what the villain fears by his choice of weapons.
quotes.author: Connie Brockway

quotes.quote: A villain must be a thing of power, handled with delicacy and grace. He must be wicked enough to excite our aversion, strong enough to arouse our fear, human enough to awaken some transient gleam of sympathy.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Love is willing to become to villain so that the one who you love can stay a hero.
quotes.author: Josephine Angelini

quotes.quote: Whenever you take on playing a villain, he has to cease to be a villain to you. If you judge this man by his time, he's doing very little wrong.
quotes.author: Colin Firth

quotes.quote: In an evil society a villain is the hero, because only the villain can speak the truth.
quotes.author: T.J. Kirk

quotes.quote: Discrimination is not done by villains. It's done by us.
quotes.author: Vivienne Ming

quotes.quote: Cinema is much more than heroes and villains.
quotes.author: Anurag Kashyap

quotes.quote: Things were easier for the old novelists who saw people all of a piece. Speaking generally, their heroes were good through and through, their villains wholly bad.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Political extremism involves two prime ingredients: an excessively simple diagnosis of the world's ills, and a conviction that there are identifiable villains back of it all.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: This country-right-or-wrong business is getting a little out-of-date.. History is moving pretty quickly these days and the heroes and villains keep on changing parts.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: They are superpower of villains. They are superpower of Al Capone.
quotes.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

quotes.quote: Every story needs its hero. And its villain. And its monster.
quotes.author: Amie Kaufman

quotes.quote: Not all people are obsessed with love in their life, some are just are obsessed to need a villain because they want to be a Hero.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: Every season hath its pleasure; Spring may boast her flowery prime, Yet the vineyard's ruby treasuries brighten Autumn's sob'rer time.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: To work a vineyard, you need a lot of guts to do that. To go out there and work all year, you almost feel that these people talk to the grapes. Wine is a lifestyle, and you can talk about it for ages. It's a passion, but it's not something I can do on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Thomas Muster

quotes.quote: Any man who, having planted a vineyard, has not yet reaped the benefits should do so at once, so that he does not die in the struggle and leave it for another to enjoy.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Would the valleys were your streets, and the green paths your alleys, that you might seek one another through vineyards, and come with the fragrance of the earth in your garments.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: When you harvest the grapes in your vineyard, do not go over the vines again. Leave what remains for the alien, the fatherless and the widow.
quotes.author: Deuteronomy 24:21

quotes.quote: There was a worm addicted to grape leaves, she continued, and suddenly it woke up. Call it a miracle, whatever, something woke it up and it wasn't a worm anymore. It was the whole vineyard, and the orchard too, the fruit, the trunks, an ever-expanding joy that didn't need to devour anything.
quotes.author: Kathryn Davis

quotes.quote: The sun had already set behind the mountains, and the sky had been drained of color. The trellises of sauvignon blanc flowed down the hill in even rows toward the valley floor. Whatever I was looking for, it wasn’t outside. As far as I could tell, the grapes were minding their own business.
quotes.author: Frederick Weisel

quotes.quote: Behold the rain which descends from heaven upon our vineyards; there it enters the roots of the vines, to be changed into wine; a constant proof that God loves us, and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I believe that the responsibility of the winemaker is to take that fruit and get it into the bottle as the most natural and purest expression of that vineyard, of the grape varietal or blend, and of the vintage.
quotes.author: Robert M. Parker

quotes.quote: In Vineyard Haven, on Martha's Vineyard, mostly I love the soft collision here of harbor and shore, the subtly haunting briny quality that all small towns have when they are situated on the sea.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: Exploring a vineyard is like signing up for an adult field trip that includes wine. Count me in.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as being lost in a vineyard. You're always in the right place.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I started looking all over for vineyard sites. I studied the conditions that make the best pinots. In the New World, you have to find the great pieces of land. Cool climate counts, but distinctive soil matters more than anything.
quotes.author: Kevin Harvey

quotes.quote: Every person should guard the vineyard where he has been called to labor.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Groves of orange and lemon perfumed the air, their ripe fruit glowing among the foliage; while, sloping to the plains, extensive vineyards spread their treasures. Beyond these, woods and pastures, and mingled towns and hamlets stretched towards the sea, on whose bright surface gleamed many a distant sail; while, over the whole scene was diffused the purple glow of evening.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Do not plant two kinds of seed in your vineyard; if you do, not only the crops you plant but also the fruit of the vineyard will be defiled.
quotes.author: Deuteronomy 22:9

quotes.quote: If you enter you neighbor's vineyard, you may eat all the grapes you want, but do not put any in your basket.
quotes.author: Deuteronomy 23:24

quotes.quote: You are but a tiny cluster upon the vines of heaven, where the grapes are worlds; yet you hold the power to ripen your bitter berries and add to the eternal vintage of cosmic sweetness if so you will.
quotes.author: Eden Phillpotts

quotes.quote: Vineyards and shining harvests, pastures, arbors, And all this our very utmost toil Can hardly care for, we wear down our strength Whether in oxen or in men, we dull The edges of our ploughshares, and in return Our fields turn mean and stingy, underfed, And so today the farmer shakes his head, More and more often sighing that his work, The labour of his hands, has come to naught.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Vineyards are basically field trips for adults and your ID is your permission slip.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It was with good reason that God commanded through Moses that the vineyard and harvest were not to be gleaned to the last grape or grain; but something to be left for the poor. For covetousness is never to be satisfied; the more it has, the more it wants. Such insatiable ones injure themselves, and transform God's blessings into evil.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: In the Old Testament... God is the owner of the vineyard. Here He is the Keeper, the Farmer, the One who takes care of the vineyard. Jesus is the genuine Vine, and the Father takes care of Him... In the Old Testament it is prophesied that the Lord Jesus would grow up before Him as a tender plant and as a root out of the dry ground. Think how often the Father intervened to save Jesus from the devil who wished to slay Him. The Father is the One who cared for the Vine, and He will care for the branches, too.
quotes.author: J. Vernon McGee

quotes.quote: We are all bound to work in the vineyard where God is the husbandman. We have all been given our little vineyard, but the way in which we cultivate it is of great importance for the prosperity of our neighbour's vineyard ... In fact all our vineyards are a part of the Lord's great vineyard, the Holy Church, and we are all bound to work here too.
quotes.author: Sigrid Undset

quotes.quote: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
quotes.author: Nicole Lyons

quotes.quote: Black and white, oldest of the vintages, newest of the last season.
quotes.author: Corpkshetrak Vikrmn

quotes.quote: You are but a tiny cluster upon the vines of heaven, where the grapes are worlds; yet you hold the power to ripen your bitter berries and add to the eternal vintage of cosmic sweetness if so you will.
quotes.author: Eden Philpotts

quotes.quote: The thing about being vintage is that it never goes out of fashion.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: We are born at a given moment, in a given place and, like vintage years of wine, we have the qualities of the year and of the season of which we are born. Astrology does not lay claim to anything more.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: When the choice is between a demanding relationship and a vintage pickup truck, I'll choose the truck every time.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: Better one bite at forty, of truths bitter rind, than the hot wine that gushed from the vintage of twenty.
quotes.author: James Russell

quotes.quote: It makes me cross when I hear people say, 'It's so last season.' I always say, 'It's vintage.'
quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

quotes.quote: What I always loved about vintage clothes is that you let the woman who wore it before you live on in some way.
quotes.author: Liz Goldwyn

quotes.quote: The battle is real. But as the women in my book prove, older ladies do not need rocking chairs. They rock.
quotes.author: Marlene Wagman-Geller

quotes.quote: Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord: / He is trampling out the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored; / He hath loosed the faithful lightning of his terrible swift sword: / His truth is marching on.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: The essence of art is to produce the modern idea under an antique form.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: O, for a draught of vintage! that hath been / Cooled a long age in the deep-delved earth, / Tasting of Flora and the country green.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Don't let ageing get you down. It's too hard to get back up.
quotes.author: John Wagner

quotes.quote: Antique jewelry, all other things being equal, increases in value as time goes on, and it has proved to be a good investment.
quotes.author: Rose Leiman Goldemberg

quotes.quote: How about the homeowners who combined rusty iron newel posts with wooden spindles in their new home for instant vintage charm.
quotes.author: Brian D. Coleman

quotes.quote: One of the moe fulfilling joys of this wacky world we call vintage is in the interesting artifacts we find, but the most rewarding aspect is the fabulous people met along the way.
quotes.author: Stacey Loalbo

quotes.quote: I would like to take the opportunity to show my appreciation for the many men and women who have given us what we have today by buying, saving, storing, and preserving their past.
quotes.author: Stacey Loalbo

quotes.quote: Nothing beats the value of vintage! Why settle for 'retro' when you can have the real thing.
quotes.author: Stacey Loalbo

quotes.quote: Vintage clothes became increasingly popular in the late 20th century as contemporary fashion developed a less prescriptive, more individualistic approach and favoured a customized referential look.
quotes.author: O'Hara Callan and Glover 2008:268

quotes.quote: While the term vintage itself and also the objects or practice it refers to have been in long existence, vintage appeared not only as a new word, but moreover as a 'new thing.'
quotes.author: Heike Jenss

quotes.quote: The term vintage connotes meanings that are other than retro more closely related to ideas of heritage, originality and a sense of superior quality associated with objects that are understood to materialize time or to get better with time.
quotes.author: Heike Jenss

quotes.quote: The value associated with vintage is not just simply inherent in them— not least because the term vintage refers now to new as well as old things.
quotes.author: Heike Jenss

quotes.quote: Elegance is the only beauty that never fades.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is easily overlooked that what is now called vintage was once brand new.
quotes.author: Tony Visconti

quotes.quote: No amount of vintage dresses gives you dignity.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: There is a phenomenal amount of pressure on women in this inndustry: they are considered vintage by the time they hit their mid 30's.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Owning vinyl is like having a beautiful painting hanging in your living room. It's something you can hold, pore over the lyrics, and immerse yourself in the art work.
quotes.author: Steven Wilson

quotes.quote: Vinyl is democratic, as surely as the iPod is fascist. Vinyl is representational: It has a face. Two faces, in fact, to represent the dualism of human nature. Vinyl occupies physical space honestly, proud as a fat woman dancing.
quotes.author: Adam Mansbach

quotes.quote: I remember opening up my first vinyl and seeing the incredible artwork it had. There's nothing like it. You also get that true gritty sound on vinyl that really makes a rock record sound great, which CDs can never achieve.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: Steve Jobs was a pioneer of digital music. But when he went home, he listened to vinyl.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Somebody was trying to tell me that CDs are better than vinyl because they don’t have any surface noise. I said, 'Listen, mate, life has surface noise.
quotes.author: John Peel

quotes.quote: Vinyl survived, we managed not to kill it. Knowing that you’ve taken part in this fight... You can’t imagine the happiness it brings. Every time I see a kid going out of the store with a vinyl record under the arms, my heart beats faster. Music should only be this. An intense emotion.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.quote: I've always been a fan of vinyl. There's something about the ritual of it. Something about it holds its gravity, for some reason. Sometimes you'll put on music and the music fades into the background. But when you take that vinyl out and put it down, the music becomes the conversation as opposed to being the soundtrack to it.
quotes.author: Frank Lero

quotes.quote: The great thing about vinyl is that if you wanted to get a decent-sounding cut, you could really only have 20 minutes max on each side.
quotes.author: Kate Bush

quotes.quote: It ain't no joke when you lose your vinyl.
quotes.author: Afrika Bambaataa

quotes.quote: People often forget this - a vinyl album could only contain a maximum of 20 minutes per side!
quotes.author: Ken Hensley

quotes.quote: I’m a big collector of vinyl – I have a record room in my house – and I’ve always had a huge soundtrack album collection. So what I do, as I’m writing a movie, is go through all those songs, trying to find good songs for fights, or good pieces of music to layer into the film.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: It was so exciting to go to the record shop and buy a piece of vinyl and hold it, read the liner notes, look at the pictures. Even the smell of the vinyl.
quotes.author: Martin Gore

quotes.quote: Vinyl is the real deal. I’ve always felt like, until you buy the vinyl record, you don’t really own the album. And it’s not just me or a little pet thing or some kind of retro romantic thing from the past. It is still alive.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.quote: I don’t think it’s real unless you put it on an LP. CDs aren’t real. Anybody can do that.
quotes.author: Bob Pollard

quotes.quote: I hate the technological rip-offs that pass for music formats these days, and go back to vinyl to hear a good record because the sound is always so much fuller. I don’t even like listening to music in the car.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: It was very important, and I felt like music ran through my blood lines, with my father being a deejay and teaching me about records. I always thought vinyl was just intriguing. A black piece of wax that spins on a turntable and nothing but good sound comes from it. So that inspiration just keeps me going in hip-hop.
quotes.author: Pete Rock

quotes.quote: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: As long as people use violence to combat violence, we will always have violence.
quotes.author: MICHAEL BERG

quotes.quote: Violence is not a catalyst but a diversion.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The sight of blood to crowds begets the thirst of more, As the first wine-cup leads to the long revel.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: A man with a briefcase can steal millions more than any man with a gun.
quotes.author: Don Henley

quotes.quote: A society that presumes a norm of violence and celebrates aggression, whether in the subway, on the football field, or in the conduct of its business, cannot help making celebrities of the people who would destroy it.
quotes.author: Lewis H. Lapham

quotes.quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I write about violence as naturally as Jane Austen wrote about manners. Violence shapes and obsesses our society, and if we do not stop being violent we have no future.
quotes.author: Edward Bond

quotes.quote: If you strike a child, take care that you strike it in anger, even at the risk of maiming it for life. A blow in cold blood neither can nor should be forgiven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell
