quotes.quote: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Nonviolence doesn't always work -- but violence never does.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Violence and smut are of course everywhere on the airwaves. You cannot turn on your television without seeing them, although sometimes you have to hunt around.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: When liberty comes with hands dabbled in blood it is hard to shake hands with her.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Violence is an admission that one's ideas and goals cannot prevail on their own merits.
quotes.author: Edward Kennedy

quotes.quote: Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The sword of murder is not the balance of justice.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: You must show the world that you abhor fighting.
quotes.author: Bishop Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Violence can only be concealed by a lie, and the lie can only be maintained by violence.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Power and violence are opposites; where the one rules absolutely, the other is absent. Violence appears where power is in jeopardy, but left to its own course it ends in power's disappearance.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: In America all too few blows are struck into flesh. We kill the spirit here, we are experts at that. We use psychic bullets and kill each other cell by cell.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: We must unite. Violence against women cannot be tolerated, in any form, in any context, in any circumstance, by any political leader or by any government.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: More and more leaders around the world are joining the struggle. More and more individuals understand that any abuse of any woman is intolerable.
quotes.author: Asha-Rose Migiro

quotes.quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There are only two forces in the world, the sword and the spirit. In the long run the sword will always be conquered by the spirit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: iolence is not merely killing another. It is violence when we use a sharp word, when we make a gesture to brush away a person, when we obey because there is fear.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Violence isn't always evil. What's evil is the infatuation with violence.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: They attack the one man with their hate and their shower of weapons. But he is like some rock which stretches into the vast sea and which, exposed to the fury of the winds and beaten against by the waves, endures all the violence.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The violet flower gives the impression of shyness, growing as it does close to the protective ground and often beneath other plants, shrubs, and trees.
quotes.author: Steven D. Price

quotes.quote: Fast-fading violets covered up in leaves; / And mid-May's eldest child, / The coming musk-rose, full of dewy wine, / The murmurous haunt of flies on summer eves.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: For Hamlet, and the trifling of his favour, / Hold it a fashion and a toy in blood, / A violet in the youth of primy nature,/ Forward, not permanent, sweet, not lasting, / The perfume and suppliance of a minute, / No more.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Life and love are life and love, a bunch of violets is a bunch of violets, and to drag in the idea of a point is to ruin everything. Live and let live, love and let love, flower and fade, and follow the natural curve, which flows on, pointless.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A tea of violet flowers and leaves soothes a headache and helps one unwind after a heavy and demanding day, and was popular as an after dinner tea in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries.
quotes.author: Margaret Joan Roberts

quotes.quote: The violet was a favorite flower in ancient Greece and became the symbol of Athens, the flower of Aphrodite, the goddess of love, and also the flower of her son Priapus, the god of gardens and the male procreative power.
quotes.author: Margaret Joan Roberts

quotes.quote: Growing violets is rewarding, as they demand little and give so much in return.
quotes.author: Margaret Joan Roberts

quotes.quote: The common meadow violet grows low to the ground, usually no higher than seven inches. It bears broad, heart-shaped leaves with scalloped edges on short stalks that grow from the plants base.
quotes.author: Glynda Joy Nord

quotes.quote: Although the name suggests the flower's color, the violet comes in blue, purple, white, gree, and even a pale gray form, known as the Confederate violet, referring to Rebel uniforms.
quotes.author: Glynda Joy Nord

quotes.quote: New Jersey was the fourth state to adopt the violet as a state flower.
quotes.author: Glynda Joy Nord

quotes.quote: A woman's love, deep in the heart, / Is like the violet flower, / That lifts its modest head apart / Im some sequestered bower.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: The beautiful modest flower still retains the bashful timidity of the nymph, partially concealing itself amidst foliage from the garish gaze of the sun.
quotes.author: Frederic Shoberl

quotes.quote: The purple heath and golden broom On moory mountains catch the gale, over lawns the lily sheds perfume, the violet in the vale.
quotes.author: James Montgomery

quotes.quote: Each violet peeps from its dwelling to gaze at the bright stars above.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: The windflower and the violet, they perished long ago, And the brier-rose and the orchis died amid the summer glow; But on the hills the golden-rod, and the aster in the wood, And the yellow sunflower by the brook, in autumn beauty stood, Till fell the frost from the clear cold heaven, as falls the plague on men, And the brightness of their smile was gone, from upland glade and glen.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: The tender violet bent in smiles to elves that sported nigh, tossing the drops of fragrant dew to scent the evening sky.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Oakes Smith

quotes.quote: Violet will be a good color for hair at just about the same time that brunette becomes a good color for flowers.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The violets were past their prime, yet their departing breath was sweeter, in the blast of death, than all the lavish fragrance of the time.
quotes.author: James Montgomery Boice

quotes.quote: The violets of five seasons reappear and fade, unseen by any human eye.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A violet by a mossy stone half hidden from the eye; Fair as a star, when only one Is shining in the sky.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The violets prattle and titter, and gaze on the stars high above.
quotes.author: Heine

quotes.quote: Purple puts us in touch with the part of ourselves that is regal. Purple is the queen in all women; it helps us keep our backs straight and heads held high.
quotes.author: Byllye Avery

quotes.quote: The violets in the mountains have broken the rocks.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: The violet thinks, with her timid blue eye, to pass for a blossom enchantingly shy.
quotes.author: Frances S. Osgood

quotes.quote: Violets smell like burnt sugar cubes that have been dipped in lemon and velvet.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: The superstition still survives in widely scattered countries that to dream of the violet is good luck.
quotes.author: Cora Linn Daniels

quotes.quote: To gather the first violet in spring, is to hasten the granting of one's dearest wish.
quotes.author: Cora Linn Daniels

quotes.quote: Violet is for faithfulness, / Which in me shall abide; / Hoping likewise that from your heart / You will not let it slide.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is nothing to save, now all is lost, but a tiny core of stillness in the heart like the eye of a violet.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: When you play a violin piece, you are a storyteller, and you're telling a story.
quotes.author: Joshua Bell

quotes.quote: The soul is like a violin string: it makes music only when it is stretched.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Yet everything that touches us, me and you, takes us together like a violin's bow, which draws one voice out of two separate strings.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Of course the most difficult thing on the violin is always intonation. The second one is rhythm. If you play in tune, in time with a good sound that's already high level. Those three are the main things.
quotes.author: Ruggiero Ricci

quotes.quote: Playing the violin and singing and whistling are just three different ways of making sound.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.quote: The violin is basically made of a wood box and four main strings.
quotes.author: Sirena Huang

quotes.quote: Violins are the lively, forward, importunate wits, that distinguish themselves by the flourishes of imagination, sharpness of repartee, glances of satire, and bear away the upper part in every consort.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: Life's like the piano and the violin, it's about how smart you could play the melodies to make a good harmony.
quotes.author: Lucy 'Aisy

quotes.quote: The longer you silence a violin, the harder it is for it to find its true voice again.
quotes.author: Alexandra Bracken

quotes.quote: No one should be allowed to play the violin until he has mastered it.
quotes.author: Jim Fiebig

quotes.quote: Violin playing is a physical art with great traditions behind it.
quotes.author: Vanessa Mae

quotes.quote: One cannot inherit a talent for the violin there are no violins in nature. Instead, one must be motivated, able to benefit from practice, and persevering.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The violin is very beautiful. Some people relate it as the shape of a lady, but, whether you like it or not, it's been so for more than 400 years, unlike modern stuff that easily looks dated. But I think it's very personal and unique that, although each violin looks pretty similar, that no two violins sound the same.
quotes.author: Sirena Huang

quotes.quote: If it is true that the violin is the most perfect of musical instruments, then Greek is the violin of human thought.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: When you play a violin piece, you are a storyteller, and you're telling a story.
quotes.author: Joshua Bell

quotes.quote: If you take a violin, you can make it sound 50 different ways. Not just pizzicato and played by the bow, but ponticello, and harmonics, and tremolos. If you take an oboe and play it, there's about one way you can make it sound: like an oboe.
quotes.author: John Corigliano

quotes.quote: The true mission of the violin is to imitate the accents of the human voice, a noble mission that has earned for the violin the glory of being called the king of instruments
quotes.author: Charles Auguste De Beriot

quotes.quote: A violin should be played with love, or not at all.
quotes.author: Joseph Wechsberg

quotes.quote: The older the violin, the sweeter the music.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: If a violin string could ache, I would be that string.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: However beautifully you play the violin, you can always play the violin even more beautifully again.
quotes.author: Arjuna Ardagh

quotes.quote: The violin â€” that most human of all instrumentsâ€¦
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: A poet is a man who puts up a ladder to a star and climbs it while playing a violin.
quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.quote: The moment you tell someone else is the moment you become a whiner and the world's smallest violin starts to play. The truth is, we all have problems.
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: â€¦The violin â€” that most human of all instrumentsâ€¦
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: The two most pleasing, expressive, and powerful single instruments of music are the human voice and the violin.
quotes.author: Joseph Pearce

quotes.quote: Violin is the product of the ingenuity of man, has only within three centuries attained to perfection, but since that period what delight, what rapture has risen from so simple a construction, when acted upon by the hand of genius!
quotes.author: Joseph Pearce

quotes.quote: The violin in the hands of genius can draw tears or create laughter.
quotes.author: Joseph Pearce

quotes.quote: The violin, in fact, in its power of expressions far excels those singers, of whom there are too many, who while singing the notes, fail to make their hearers understand the sense of their songs.
quotes.author: Joseph Pearce

quotes.quote: The viral power of online media has proven how fast creative ideas can be spread and adopted, using tools like cellphones, digital cameras, micro-credit, mobile banking, Facebook, and Twitter. A perfect example? The way the Green Movement in Iran caught fire thanks to social media.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: I realized that influence was inextricably linked to impact-the more influence you had, the more impact you could create.... The ability to make things go viral felt like the closest that we could get to having a human superpower.
quotes.author: Emerson Spartz

quotes.quote: More and more, the things we do in real life will end up as Facebook posts. And while we may be consoled by the fact that most of this stuff is being posted just to our friends, it only takes one friend to share that information with his or her friends to start a viral chain.
quotes.author: Ben Parr

quotes.quote: When I first started, I wasn't trying to go viral. I just liked making funny videos, content that people would enjoy.
quotes.author: Lil Nas X

quotes.quote: The ice bucket challenge went viral in 2014, partly because it was so much fun to watch videos of celebrities or friends dumping ice water on their heads. Videos of people in the challenge have been watched more than 10 billion times on Facebook - more than once per person on the planet.
quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

quotes.quote: No one cares about anything until it’s something that goes viral. It’s most certainly frustrating.
quotes.author: Maria Taylor

quotes.quote: Viral videos aren't just about being funny. They're about identity creation.
quotes.author: Ricky Van Veen

quotes.quote: Romance isn't measured by how viral your proposal goes. The Internet age may try to sell you something different, but don't ever forget that viral is closely associated with sickness - so don't ever make being viral your goal.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: The more awesome you are, the more emotion you create, the more viral it is.
quotes.author: Emerson Spartz

quotes.quote: I like to know why a video has suddenly gone viral, why a song has broken, why a TV show is suddenly rating out of pattern... I'm pretty good at understanding why things are becoming popular.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: The world is changing and how we reach people has changed. It's no longer throwing ads on your network and putting up billboards. It's now social media and things move virally, and the networks haven't always caught up to that.
quotes.author: Malik Yoba

quotes.quote: I don't even have Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. Why would I ever want to be viral when I'm not even on the Internet?
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.quote: Everybody can have a viral success. You find something unique, that can happen.
quotes.author: Robert Kyncl

quotes.quote: I know very little about the viral, electronic world, but I use Twitter to communicate not only information that I think some of the fans want to hear about but also ideas.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: As far as what makes a viral video, then it's gotta be something that you've either never seen before, a fresh piece of comedy, or something that relates to something topical.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.quote: In the end, the whole Internet thing kills me, because you can use it as a positive thing or you can read into all the negativity. And I think youve gotta put out positive energy, put out cool viral stuff, and then just stay out of peoples opinions.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: The Internet wasn't even an option for me, so one of the reasons I was so motivated to do street art was because there was no other outlet. Maybe if the Internet had been around then, I would have tried to do stuff that went viral and was clever and got me a lot of hits.
quotes.author: Shepard Fairey

quotes.quote: Today's evangelism is just as likely to take place via chat rooms and viral videos as it is in a personal conversation or a sermon.
quotes.author: Martin Lindstrom

quotes.quote: The Army of Northern Virginia was never defeated. It merely wore itself out whipping the enemy.
quotes.author: Jubal Early

quotes.quote: The only thing here was a long gray ribbon of road, stretched like tape stuck by a toddler onto a rolling carpet of green hills under a huge arch of blue sky. This is Virginia. My Virginia, anyway.
quotes.author: Beth Harbison

quotes.quote: When I was growing up in Virginia, the Civil War was presented to me as glorious with dramatic courage and military honor. Later, I realized how death was central to the reality. It was at the core of women's lives. It's what they talked about most.
quotes.author: Drew Gilfin Faust

quotes.quote: The force I represent is Virginia's New Mainstream. It looks forward, not backwards. It tries to unify people, not divide them.
quotes.author: Douglas wilder

quotes.quote: People in West Virginia do have cars. We have indoor plumbing. We even use knives and forks.
quotes.author: John Kruk

quotes.quote: I enjoyed growing up part of my life in Virginia Beach. We had the ocean and the beach and a beautiful landscape. We were outdoors all the time and we played outside.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.quote: I think family is very important in West Virginia and has long been so because the mountains made travel difficult in the past, and family members had to depend on each other.
quotes.author: David Selby

quotes.quote: There are no masses in Virginia City, only individuals whose will for good or bad can bring them to the ends they ought to have. I like that very much.
quotes.author: To Dr. Mildred Watson

quotes.quote: If Virginia stands by the old Union, so will I. But if she secedes,... then I will follow my native state with my sword and, if need be, with my life.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Separation of church and state in Virginia, instead of weakening Christianity, as the conservatives of the Revolution had feared, really aided it in securing a power over men far greater than it had known in the past.
quotes.author: H.J. Eckenrode

quotes.quote: A lot of good things start in Virginia; a lot of good things have started in Virginia. We're no strangers to firsts.
quotes.author: Robert Hurt

quotes.quote: Virginia is the place, where, technologically speaking, they will burn people at the stake for possessing such things as toasters.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: I spent my first two years at a small all-male college in Virginia called Hampden-Sydney. That was like going to college 120 years ago. The languages, a year of rhetoric, all of the great books, Western Man courses, stuff like that.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: I'm happy that I have my family, and I'm happy that I had Virginia, where I grew up, to retreat to any time I felt overwhelmed. Whenever there were times when I felt like the rug was being pulled out from under me and I was floating in this crazy space, I would stop and go back to that neighborhood and realize nothing's changed, really.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.quote: Virginia Beach is just such a melting pot for so many different things, and they just have so many influences. I would always say that the area definitely influences Play Cloths. The area itself just has so many influences, whether it be fashion, music, everything.
quotes.author: Pusha T

quotes.quote: Virginia was in fact a landowning aristocracy, without nobility or merchant class, or any considerable small peasant farming class; and the other Southern colonies, except North Carolina, were on the whole similar to Virginia in these respects.
quotes.author: Carl L. Becker

quotes.quote: A new report shows that, in Virginia, gun violence has fallen as the sale of firearms has soared to a new record. In other news, a recent study shows that most criminals don't like getting shot at.
quotes.author: Fred Thompson

quotes.quote: Virtual reality is the 'ultimate empathy machine.' These experiences are more than documentaries. They're opportunities to walk a mile in someone else's shoes.
quotes.author: Chris Milk

quotes.quote: What the computer in virtual reality enables us to do is to recalibrate ourselves so that we can start seeing those pieces of information that are invisible to us but have become important for us to understand.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The fact that we can, possibly in the future, create virtual realities with conscious beings is truly astonishing, for we have evolved from single-celled organisms that did not have a brain.
quotes.author: Rajesh Mankar

quotes.quote: Virtual reality is a denial of reality. We need to be open to the powers of imagination, which brings something useful to reality. Virtual reality can imprison people.
quotes.author: Hayao Mizayaki

quotes.quote: The telephone is virtual reality in that you can meet with someone as if you are together, at least for the auditory sense.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: You need virtual reality to understand high level science or high level math. It's very helpful to explain third and fourth dimensional things that people are constantly addressing in quantum physics. But, as soon as you're creating an avatar, and you can live and you can start to feel sensations on VR, that has gone too far.
quotes.author: Jaden Smith

quotes.quote: I like live audiences, with real people - virtual reality is no substitute.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: We experience virtual reality on most nights while we are asleep, through our dreams.
quotes.author: Rajesh

quotes.quote: If you have perfect virtual reality eventually, where you're be able to simulate everything that a human can experience or imagine experiencing, it's hard to imagine where you go from there.
quotes.author: Palmer Luckey

quotes.quote: Within 25 years, virtual reality meetings will be essentially transparent to being there in person. Once we can do this, the idea of climbing into an aircraft, and burning up huge quantities of fossil fuels to propel our bodies and briefcases full of papers, will seem absolutely backward.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.quote: Some people prefer to see the game in the television than to go to the stadium. With virtual reality this will go to be worse, but at the end the 'real' reality will win, because a virtual meal is not the same thing as a real one!
quotes.author: Rodolfo Llinas

quotes.quote: Virtual reality was once the dream of science fiction. But the internet was also once a dream, and so were computers and smartphones. The future is coming.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: VR at its best shouldn't replace real life, just modify it, giving us access to so much just out of reach physically, economically. If you can dream it, VR can make it.
quotes.author: Matthew Schnipper

quotes.quote: The thing that's remarkably beautiful to me about virtual reality is that you can make up reality in virtual reality and share it with other people. It's like having a collaborative lucid dream.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: VR is a way to escape the real world into something more fantastic. It has the potential to be the most social technology of all time.
quotes.author: Palmer Luckey

quotes.quote: As the Internet of things advances, the very notion of a clear dividing line between reality and virtual reality becomes blurred, sometimes in creative ways.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: The dream of life is really an illusion, and everybody lives in the reality he or she creates - a virtual reality that is only true for the one who creates it.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Virtual reality is a self-created form of chosen reality. Therefore it exists.
quotes.author: Joan Lowery Nixon

quotes.quote: I started looking at small companies that were running a sort of virtual reality cottage industry: I had imagined that I would just put on a helmet and be somewhere else - that's your dream of what it's going to be.
quotes.author: Thomas Dolby

quotes.quote: Ability may get you to the top but it's character that will keep you there.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Be not niggardly of what costs thee nothing, as courtesy, counsel and countenance.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Be not overcome by evil but repay evil with good.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Beauty without virtue is a flower without perfume.
quotes.author: French (on beauty)

quotes.quote: Character is easier kept than recovered.
quotes.author: English (on character and virtue)

quotes.quote: Civility costs nothing and buys everything.
quotes.author: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Do good and care not to whom.
quotes.author: Portuguese (on good and evil)

quotes.quote: Do what comes natural.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't hang your hat higher than you can reach.
quotes.author: Belizean (on balance and moderation)

quotes.quote: Don't talk unless you can improve the silence.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't toot your own horn.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Each year one vicious habit rooted out, in time might make the worst man good throughout.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Give credit where credit is due.
quotes.author: M. Floy

quotes.quote: Good example is the best sermon.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good wine needs no bush.
quotes.author: R. Taverner

quotes.quote: Goodness does not consist in greatness but greatness in goodness.
quotes.author: Athenaeus

quotes.quote: Grace thou thy house and let not that grace thee.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Handsome is as handsome does.
quotes.author: Anthony Munday

quotes.quote: Idleness and pride tax with a heavier hand than kings and parliaments.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If evils come not then our fears are in vain; and if they do, fear but augments the pain.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If I keep my character, I'll be rich enough.
quotes.author: Plutonius

quotes.quote: If you are not good for yourself, how can you be good for others.
quotes.author: Spanish (on character and virtue)

quotes.quote: If you make yourself into a doormat, people will wipe their feet on you.
quotes.author: Belizean (on character and virtue)

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift someone else up.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: If you'ld have a servant that you like, serve yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is better to take many injuries than to give one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is easy to kick a person when he is down.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It's an ill bird that fouls his own nest.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: No one is hurt by doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Hawaiian (on good and evil)

quotes.quote: Nobility is not a birthright, but is defined by one's actions.
quotes.author: Darren Bateman

quotes.quote: If you don’t have a vision you’re going to be stuck in what you know.  And the only thing you know is what you’ve already seen.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.author: Joel A. Barker

quotes.quote: A vision is not just a picture of what could be; it is an appeal to our better selves, a call to become something more.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Vision is the true creative rhythm.
quotes.author: Robert Delaunay

quotes.quote: Clarity of vision is the key to achieving your objectives.
quotes.author: Tom Steyer

quotes.quote: The vision must be followed by the venture. It is not enough to stare up the steps - we must step up the stairs.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action with without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Where there is no vision the people perish.
quotes.author: Proverbs 29:18

quotes.quote: Vision without execution is hallucination.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Vision animates, inspires, transforms purpose into action.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Every person takes the limits of their own field of vision for the limits of the world.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how fast you can go, it doesn't matter how much passion you have, and it doesn't matter how much energy you put into something. If you don't have a vision and clarity on the destination you want to reach, you'll simply never get there.
quotes.author: Dean Graziosi

quotes.quote: Vision gets the dreams started. Dreaming employs your God-given imagination to reinforce the vision. Both are part of something I believe is absolutely necessary to building the life of a champion, a winner, a person of high character who is consistently at the top of whatever game he or she is in.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: Where there is no vision, the people won't follow. Vision for a better future is the great motivator.
quotes.author: Hans Finzel

quotes.quote: The more boundless your vision, the more real you are.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Hold the vision, trust the process.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's not what the vision is, it's what the vision does.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: The best vision is insight.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Create a vision of what you want your future to look like, then set your goals and take action.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: To have a vision for your life is to see where you could be, not where you are now.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Live your vision and demand your success.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The visionary denies the truth to himself, the liar only to others.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To be a visionary, all you have to do is make decisions based off of your eyes instead of your ears and your memory.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: A person who sees a problem is a human being; a person who finds a solution is visionary; and the person who goes out and does something about it is an entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: Someone who dreams cannot be forced to stopâ€”there are no limitations to dreams, because we do not own dreams, dreams are from God.
quotes.author: Christina Westover

quotes.quote: Be a visionary, focused upon your ability to create your desires within your reality.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Visionaries not only believe that the impossible can be done, but that it must be done.
quotes.author: Brad Ferran

quotes.quote: The visionary is the only realist.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: Being a visionary is a new profession, but it is really just a variant on fortunetelling, which may be the world's oldest. And its marketing appeal is similar - people will pay for reassurance about the unknown.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: Visionary minds are in demand to bear us into the dawn of the deep digital era.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Visionary people face the same problems everyone else faces; but rather than get paralyzed by their problems, visionaries immediately commit themselves to finding a solution.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: Visionary people are visionary partly because of the very great many things they don't see.
quotes.author: Berkeley Rice

quotes.quote: The more visionary the idea, the more people it leaves behind.
quotes.author: Samantha Morton

quotes.quote: The visionary is the one who brings his or her voice into the world and who refuses to edit, rehearse, perform, or hide. It is the visionary who knows that the power of creativity is aligned with authenticity.
quotes.author: Angeles Arrien

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: The visionary starts with a clean sheet of paper, and re-imagines the world.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The visionary who is serving God ceases to live for personal ambitions, but rather for God's ambitions.
quotes.author: George Barna

quotes.quote: To be realistic today is to be visionary. To be realistic is to be starry-eyed.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Don't be an interpreter of reality, be a visionary. Don't think about it, see it!
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: A visionary thrives in all circumstances.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: Visionary builds what dreamers imagined.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: You don't need vision to be a visionary.
quotes.author: Aaron Scheidies

quotes.quote: The main reason leaders are needed is to move the organization forward, to make progress. Leadership is where tomorrow begins.
quotes.author: Kouzes and Posner

quotes.quote: As a visionary, you are extremely passionate. You have lots of ideas. Those great ideas can take companies to the moon. For this reason you are invaluable.
quotes.author: Gino Wickman

quotes.quote: As a visionary, you are very creative. You're great at devising solutions to big problems, not the little practical ones.
quotes.author: Gino Wickman

quotes.quote: A key value to bring as a visionary is the ability to discover and figure out new ways to make things work.
quotes.author: Gino Wickman

quotes.quote: Your vision is so strong, you are convinced the company can get there. Although you don't yet know exactly how, that does not lessen your conviction.
quotes.author: Gino Wickman

quotes.quote: Visionaries are the creators of almost everything.
quotes.author: Gino Wickman

quotes.quote: Visionary leaders energize and inspire people to work towards a future goal.
quotes.author: Randy Grieser

quotes.quote: Vision gives us a sense of purpose and guides us as we work in th present. Visionaries are able to clearly and vividly communicate what the future holds.
quotes.author: Randy Grieser

quotes.quote: Some visionaries are idea-driven, genius investors full of quirks and idiosyncrasies.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Mason

quotes.quote: The limits of my language are the limits of my universe.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Your inability to see other possibilities and your lack of vocabulary are your brain's limits, not the universe's.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: You can't buildÂ up a vocabularyÂ if you never meet any new words. And to meet them you must read. The more you read the better.Â
quotes.author: Rudolf Flesch

quotes.quote: Your understanding of whatÂ you read and hear is, to a very large degree, determined by your vocabulary, so improve your vocabulary daily.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Human vocabulary is still not capable, and probably never will be, of knowing, recognizing, and communicating everything that can be humanly experienced and felt.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: Loving your language means a command of its vocabulary beyond the level of the everyday.
quotes.author: John McWhorter

quotes.quote: AsÂ vocabularyÂ is reduced , so are the number of feelings you can express, the number of events you can describe, the number of the things you can identify! Not only understanding is limited, but also experience. Man grows by language. Whenever he limits language he retrogresses!
quotes.author: Sheri S. Tepper

quotes.quote: Simply by changing your habitual vocabulary, you can instantaneously change how you think, how you feel, and how you live.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Short words are best, and old words when short are best of all.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: VocabularyÂ enables us to interpret and to express. If you have a limitedÂ vocabulary, you will also have a limited vision and a limited future.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: VocabularyÂ for aggravation is large.Â VocabularyÂ for transcendence is elusive.
quotes.author: Jennifer Senior

quotes.quote: TheÂ vocabularyÂ and manner of classical ballet express a high order of discipline and restraint, a sense of harmony with forces larger and more lasting than the individual.
quotes.author: Marsha B. Siegel

quotes.quote: We use the vocabulary of light to describe a spiritual experience.
quotes.author: James Turrell

quotes.quote: As the language orÂ vocabularyÂ of photography has been extended, the emphasis of meaning has shifted, shifted from what the world looks like to what we feel about the world and what we want the world to mean.
quotes.author: Aaron Siskind

quotes.quote: Vocabulary is a matterÂ of word-buildingÂ as well as word-using.Â
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: Vocabularies are crossing circles and loops. We are defined by the lines we choose to cross or to be confined by.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Syntax and vocabulary are overwhelming constraints --the rules that run us. Language is using us to talk --we think we're using the language, but language is doing the thinking, we're its slavish agents.
quotes.author: Harry Mathews

quotes.quote: One forgets words as one forgets names. One's vocabulary needs constant fertilizing or it will die.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: The personalÂ vocabulary, the individual melody whose metre is one's biography, joins in that sound, with any luck, and the body moves like a walking, a waking island.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: Success andÂ vocabularyÂ go hand in hand. This has been proven so often that it no longer admits of argument.
quotes.author: Wilfred Funk

quotes.quote: The more words you know, the more clearly and powerfully you will think ... and the more ideas you will invite into your mind.
quotes.author: Wilfred Funk

quotes.quote: The vocabulary of pleasure depends on the imagery of pain.
quotes.author: Marina Warner

quotes.quote: Words play an enormous part in our lives and are therefore deserving of the closest study.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: A word out of place or an interesting choice of vocabulary can spawn a whole character.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: Practice the vocabulary of love - unlearn the language of hate and contempt.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: The words that come direct from the people are the greatest.If you substitute one out of your own vocabulary, it disappears before your eyes.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: TheÂ vocabularyÂ of an omniscient man would embrace words and images excluded from polite conversation. What would be base, or even obscene, to the obscene, becomes illustrious, spoken in a new connexion of thought.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A vocabulary of truth and simplicityÂ will be of service throughout your life.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: We are losing our commonÂ vocabulary, built over thousands of years to help and delight and instruct us, for the sake of what we take to be the new technology's virtues.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: A limitedÂ vocabulary, but one with which you can make numerous combinations, is better than thirty thousand words that only hamper the action of the mind.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Whatever vocation you decide on, track down the best people in the world at doing it and surround yourself with them.
quotes.author: Scott Weiss

quotes.quote: To forgive is the vocation of all Christians.
quotes.author: Matthew C. Harrison

quotes.quote: It is the vocation of the Christian in every generation to out-think all opposition.
quotes.author: Elton Trueblood

quotes.quote: Find a vocation and passionately commit your life to it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It is not more vacation we need - it is more vocation.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Every disability conceals a vocation, if only we can find it, which will 'turn the necessity to glorious gain.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Motherhood is the most challenging as well as the utmost satisfying vocation in this world.
quotes.author: Nita Ambani

quotes.quote: Every man has two vocations: his own and philosophy.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Where your talents and the needs of the world cross; there lies your vocation.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The secret of success is making your vocation your vacation.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Every man has a vocation to be someone: but he must understand clearly that in order to fulfill this vocation he can only be one person: himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: A dentist at work in his vocation always looks down in the mouth
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: Many people mistake our work for our vocation. Our vocation is the love of Jesus.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Vocation is different from talent. One can have vocation and not have talent; one can be called and not know how to go.
quotes.author: Benjamin Moser

quotes.quote: The pursuit of excellence is the proper vocation of man.
quotes.author: Cassius Jackson Keyser

quotes.quote: Vocations are born in prayer and from prayer; and only in prayer can they persevere and bear fruit.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: See your vocation as a God-given path to holiness.
quotes.author: Dom Hubert Van Zeller

quotes.quote: Research is not a systematic occupation but an intuitive artistic vocation.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: A vocation is the backbone of life.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The highest vocation of photography is to explain man to man.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The vocation of every man and woman is to serve other people.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Waiting is the great vocation of the dispossessed.
quotes.author: Mary Gordon

quotes.quote: An unfulfilled vocation drains the color from a man's entire existence.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: When something is a vocation, you don't really make a decision about it.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: Each of us has our own specific vocation, a sacred journey prepared by the Creator of the universe.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: Every man has his own vocation, talent is the call.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The test of a vocation is the love of the drudgery it involves.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: No vocation on this side of heaven is as privileged or rewarding as Christian ministry.
quotes.author: Joel Beeke

quotes.quote: Peacemaking is a full-time vocation that includes each member of God's people.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: A vocation is born to us all; happily most of us meet promptly our twin, - occupation.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: There's no absolutes in life, only vodka.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: Vodka is a very deceptive drink. You can't taste it, you can't smell it.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Once we hit forty, women only have about four taste buds left: one for vodka, one for wine, one for cheese, and one for chocolate.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: Vodka is tasteless going down, but it is memorable coming up.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: They say milk gives u strength. Drink three glasses and try moving a wall. You can't. Drink three shots of vodka and it moves all by itself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If wine is fruit, then vodka must be a vegetable.
quotes.author: Jann Arden

quotes.quote: We drank our coffee the Russian way. That is to say we had vodka before it and vodka afterwards.
quotes.author: Philip Sington

quotes.quote: Vodka is like water, but with consequences.
quotes.author: Tom Rachman

quotes.quote: The key factor in the vodka category is smoothness, and smoothness is what our vodka has.
quotes.author: Fuzzy Zoeller

quotes.quote: Vodka does not ease back pain. But it does get your mind off it.
quotes.author: Fuzzy Zoeller

quotes.quote: Vodka is a wonderful drink. You can drink so much of it without being as hung over as you would if you were drinking one of the brown liquors the whiskeys and such. It's a great drink to go with appetizers.
quotes.author: Gary Shteyngart

quotes.quote: Vodka eyeballing sounds great, but it's a slippery slope. Next, you'll be scotch nostriling, tequila nippling and, before you know it, Jager tainting.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: The relationship between a Russian and a bottle of vodka is almost mystical.
quotes.author: Richard Owen

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: He buys his roast beef, I buy my bottle of vodka. We get along real good.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: When that first martini hits the liver like a silver bullet, there is a sigh of contentment that can be heard in Dubuque.
quotes.author: William Emerson. Jr.

quotes.quote: I don't drink liquor. I don’t like it. It makes me feel good.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: It is all nonsense about not being able to work without ale, and gin, and cider, and fermented liquors. Do lions and carthorses drink ale?
quotes.author: Rev. Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: If you were to ask me if I'd ever had the bad luck to miss my daily cocktail. I'd have to say that I doubt it; where certain things are concerned, I plan ahead.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When I was younger I made it a rule never to take a strong drink before lunch. Now it is my rule never to do so before breakfast.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I drink too much. Last time I gave a urine sample there was an olive in it.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Malt does more than Milton can, / To justify God's ways to man.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: The sway of alcohol over mankind is unquestionably due to its power to stimulate the mystical faculties of human nature, usually crushed to earth by the cold facts and dry criticisms of the sober hour. Sobriety' diminishes, discriminates, and says no; drunkenness expands, unites and says yes.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: By the time a bartender knows what drink a man will have before he orders, there is little else about him worth knowing.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: We cannot move around large quantities of necessary fluids without spilling them occasionally. Those of us who drink have proven this by experimental method.
quotes.author: P.J. O’Rourke

quotes.quote: Yes, God is in the details, hut at some point even God says, 'Enough, let’s go have a cocktail!'
quotes.author: Eno Putain

quotes.quote: A medium Vodka dry Martini — with a slice of lemon peel. Shaken and not stirred.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: Vodka is the only thing that makes potatoes palatable, and without vodka, Russia would have won the Cold War. The word itself comes from the Slavic term for 'water,' or 'voda.' Somehow the 'k' sound gives it more of a kick, doncha think?
quotes.author: Steven Kates

quotes.quote: You say potato, I say vodka.
quotes.author: Karen Walker

quotes.quote: the voice of beauty speaks softly; it creeps only into the most fully awakened souls
quotes.author: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Nothing can stand in the way of the power of millions of voices calling for change.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: How wonderful is the human voice! It is indeed the organ of the soul. The intellect of man is enthroned visibly on his forehead and in his eye, and the heart of man is written on his countenance, but the soul, the soul reveals itself in the voice only.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Listen to your own voice, your own soul. Too many people listen to the noise of the world, instead of themselves.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Two voices are there; one is of the sea, One of the mountains: each a mighty Voice.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The voice of the intellect is a soft one, but it does not rest until it has gained a hearing.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed. If people all over the world...would do this, it would change the earth.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The message behind the words is the voice of the heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The human voice is the organ of the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: A voice cannot carry the tongue and the lips that gave it wings. Alone must it seek the ether. And alone and without his nest shall the eagle fly across the sun.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The voice so sweet, the words so fair, As some soft chime had stroked the air; And though the sound had parted thence, Still left an echo in the sense.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: The voice is a human sound which nothing inanimate can perfectly imitate. It has an authority and an insinuating property which writing lacks. It is not merely so much air, but air modulated and impregnated with life.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: We all have a voice. Some a whisper, some a roar. If you can roar, roar for others. If you can only whisper, keep trying. Every roar started small.
quotes.author: M.L. Shanahan

quotes.quote: The decision is your own voice, an opinion is the echo of someone else's voice.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: We must pay attention to that quiet and persistent inner voice of ours. If it's urging us to change something; we must obey, so we won't have to repeat a previous mistake.
quotes.author: Alis Cerrahyan

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to use your voice to make a difference. Your story, unlike any other, has the power to change the world.
quotes.author: Amanda Bernardo

quotes.quote: Everyone finds their voice at different times in their life.
quotes.author: Lilly Singh

quotes.quote: Your inner voice, your instinct, knows everything.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: There is nothing more important to true growth than realizing that you are not the voice of the mind - you are the one who hears it.
quotes.author: Michael A. Singer

quotes.quote: That voice that cries out doesn't have to be a weakling's does it?
quotes.author: John Osborne

quotes.quote: How sweetly sounds the voice of a good woman! It is so seldom heard that, when it speaks,it ravishes all senses.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: Honesty is the voice that is acceptable in every matter.
quotes.author: Steve Aylett

quotes.quote: The artist...is the voice of the people.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Trust that little voice in your head that says 'Wouldn't it be interesting if...'; And then do it.
quotes.author: Duane Michals

quotes.quote: Words are the voice of the heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Volleyball is one of the most interactive games going. It is a game of intuition, imagination, improvisation - but most of all, of reciprocity - of teamwork. There is no way to free-lance in volleyball.
quotes.author: Marv Dunphy

quotes.quote: Volleyball: It's in your heart; or it's in your face.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: No volleyball play can begin without a serve, and the serve is the only technique that is totally under your control. In other endeavors, you cannot succeed without believing in yourself, and that belief is completely under your control.
quotes.author: Karch Kiraly

quotes.quote: My coach tells me to give about 75% to volleyball. If I give 100%, my serve will kill someone, and my coach doesn't want to deal with the paperwork.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Be a leader. A setter should be high energy. It's important that you learn how to give positive, constructive criticism. It's crucial that you make your teammates feel comfortable. You should never be the most silent player in the gym.
quotes.author: Lindsey Berg

quotes.quote: I got the nickname Spitfire for a reason. I burned inside to play volleyball. I loved the competition of it.
quotes.author: Summer Altice

quotes.quote: The beach game taught me great lessons about how to elevate the play of my teammate, or teammates, and how to anticipate and expect the ball so much more than the indoor game ever could. It taught me - even forced me - to be a much better-all-around player.
quotes.author: Karch Kiraly

quotes.quote: Somewhere behind the athlete you've become, and the hours of practice, and the coaches who have pushed you is a little girl who fell in love with the game and never looked back... play for her.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Volleyball: Invented by men, perfected by women
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Volleyball anchored me at a time in my life when I needed it. It gave me a reason for being this big, big girl.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Reece

quotes.quote: Volleyball is not just a sport, it's a way to express your anger without hurting someone.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of hard work and dedication just like any pro sport. Especially for beach volleyball you don't have to be tall or as fast as other sports. You just have to have the skills.
quotes.author: Misty May

quotes.quote: Kerri and I stay motivated because we hate to lose. What's great about beach volleyball is you can always find something to get better at. I don't think about losing. It could happen. I just go out there and play. I couldn't tell you any numbers or winning streaks. I just go out and do it.
quotes.author: Misty May

quotes.quote: Breathe, believe, and battle. My former coach, Troy Tanner, told us that before each match. Breathe - be in the moment. Believe - have faith that you can rise above it. Battle - you gotta be prepared to go for as long as it takes.
quotes.author: Kerri Walsh

quotes.quote: Don't ever let the ball hit the ground without a body hitting the ground with it.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: A good team can win a volleyball game when they are ahead, but only a great team can win when they are behind.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: There is pressure on every play. You can't make a mistake, but that also means your opponent can't make a mistake. It makes the matches more exciting to watch.
quotes.author: Holly McPeak

quotes.quote: Volleyball is the sport through which I am able to express my God-given talents of being an athlete. It is a sport which involves relating, pushing, and encouraging your teammates.
quotes.author: David Beard

quotes.quote: It was unbelievable. It was so great to work like that and be able to pull it out at the very end. We played so well together, helping each other out at just the right time. We never gave up and it all worked out better than we could have hoped for against such great opposition. We were in one of the toughest matches I've ever played.
quotes.author: Sarrah Stratton

quotes.quote: You can't just beat a team, you have to leave a lasting impression in their minds so they never want to see you again.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: I love that our sport is sexy. I think it is appropriately so.
quotes.author: Kerri Walsh

quotes.quote: Volleyball is more than a sport, it's a way of life
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Anyone serious about playing indoor, you should play outdoor.
quotes.author: Sean Scott

quotes.quote: Volleyball is my life, everything else is just details.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than coaches
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Volleyball is like going to church… Many attend, but few understand.
quotes.author: John Kessel

quotes.quote: Sometimes your opponents will try to intimidate you by staring at you before they serve. You can avoid the cold-war tactics by staring at the ball instead of their eyes. It tells the server: "Hey, I'm ready for anything you've got - give it to me".
quotes.author: Karch Kiraly

quotes.quote: Volleyball wasn’t just a sport, it was a religion.
quotes.author: Mike Hebert

quotes.quote: Effective blockers are unquestionably the keystone of a successful defense.
quotes.author: Don Shondell

quotes.quote: I was throwing up volleyballs today, and they were spiking them for kills.
quotes.author: Erik Hanson

quotes.quote: I welcome you to the community of people who have decided that EASY will no longer suffice!
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands — one for helping yourself, and the other for helping others.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Betty Reese

quotes.quote: It is not enough to be compassionate. You must act.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: At the end of the day it’s not about what you have or even what you’ve accomplished. It’s about who you’ve lifted up, who you’ve made better. It’s about what you’ve given back.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: Even if it’s a little thing, do something for those who have need of a man’s help something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it. For, remember, you don’t live in a world all your own. Your brothers are here, too.
quotes.author: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.quote: Volunteers do not necessarily have the time; they just have the heart.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Andrew

quotes.quote: Volunteers are the only human beings on the face of the earth who reflect this nation’s compassion, unselfish caring, patience, and just plain loving one another.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: While earning your daily bread, be sure you share a slice with those less fortunate.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Volunteerism is the voice of the people put into action. These actions shape and mold the present into a future of which we can all be proud.
quotes.author: Helen Dyer

quotes.quote: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Not only must we be good, but we must also be good for something.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The broadest, and maybe the most meaningful definition of volunteering: Doing more than you have to because you want to, in a cause you consider good.
quotes.author: Ivan Scheier

quotes.quote: Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Only by giving are you able to receive more than you already have.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The only people with whom, you should try to get even are those who have helped you.
quotes.author: John E. Southard

quotes.quote: Every person can make a difference, and every person should try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy, but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you have lived at all.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: One can pay back the loan of gold, but one dies forever in debt to those who are kind.
quotes.author: Malayan Proverb

quotes.quote: Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: To ease another's heartache is to forget one's own.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Volunteerism is currency that appreciates.
quotes.author: Website Of Administrators Of Volunteer Resources Bc

quotes.quote: Volunteering is so pervasive it's invisible. We take for granted all the things that have been pioneered by concerned, active volunteers.
quotes.author: Susan J. Ellis

quotes.quote: Who then can so softly bind up the wound of another as he who has felt the same wound himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to him his own.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The moral test of a society is how that society treats those who are in the dawn of life -- the children; those who are in the twilight of life -- the elderly; and those who are in the shadow of life -- the sick, the needy, and the handicapped.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on Earth.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Your life and mine should be valued not by what we take... but by what we give.
quotes.author: Edgar Allen

quotes.quote: What is the essence of life? To serve others and to do good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do every act of your life as if it were your last.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: To show great love for God and our neighbor we need not do great things. It is how much love we put in the doing that makes our offering something beautiful for God.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We are prone to judge success by the index of our salaries or the size of our automobiles, rather than by the quality of our service relationship to humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: There is no better exercise for your heart, Than reaching down and helping to lift someone up.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: A pessimist, they say, sees a glass of water as being half empty; an optimist sees the same glass as half full. But a giving person sees a glass of water and starts looking for someone who might be thirsty.
quotes.author: G. Donald Gale

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.'
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.
quotes.author: James D. Miles

quotes.quote: Never underestimate your ability to make someone else's life better-even if you never know it.
quotes.author: Greg Louganis

quotes.quote: To be good, and to do good, is all we have to do.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Three keys to more abundant living: caring about others, daring for others, sharing with others.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Volunteers are the only human beings on the face of the earth who reflect this nation's compassion, unselfish caring, patience, and just plain love for one another.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: We ourselves must be full of life if we are going to make life fuller for others.
quotes.author: David Sawyer

quotes.quote: We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Giving kids clothes and food is one thing but it's much more important to teach them that other people besides themselves are important, and that the best thing they can do with their lives is to use them in the service of other people.
quotes.author: Dolores Huerta

quotes.quote: The world is hugged by the faithful arms of volunteers.
quotes.author: Everett Mamor

quotes.quote: Unselfish and noble actions are the most radiant pages in the biography of souls.
quotes.author: David Thomas

quotes.quote: Haiti is unique - the first successful slave revolt in history, the first black republic etc., and then when you get into the culture, the voodoo, and that wonderful synchretization of Christian and African belief and symbology, it's like nothing the world has ever seen.
quotes.author: Ben Fountain

quotes.quote: My understanding of voodoo is that it was important to the people who practiced it because it helped them survive. There are practical ways it enabled survival. It used herbal medicine to heal, to aid in childbirth. It was a spiritual system. It made room for hope and for magic and for possibility. For people who struggle and fight to survive and who fight to live, those are really important things.
quotes.author: Jesmyn Ward

quotes.quote: If science ever gets to the bottom of Voodoo in Haiti and Africa, it will be found that some important medical secrets, still unknown to medical science, give it its power, rather than the gestures of ceremony.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: I straightforward invite you to this worldly connection of God and their function for the procedures of performing magical rites. I ensure you with the best voodoo and love spell which will embody magical powers.
quotes.author: Ever Smith

quotes.quote: I think that voodoo as a spiritual tradition has been demonized for so long in popular culture. I wanted to write against that and write a character who practiced that spiritual tradition who was not evil and intent on creating zombies or causing pain through voodoo dolls or whatever.
quotes.author: Jesmyn Ward

quotes.quote: People who have power, who think negatively of others and seek to injure them, are practicing a kind of voodoo, a lower sorcery.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The background of the Negro culture is voodoo and magic; and the purposes the magic are control and power over God, man, nature and society. Voodoo and magic was the religion and life of America's Negro.
quotes.author: R.J. Rushdoony

quotes.quote: Unscrupulous cold-blooded sorcerers rigidly obeying the unholy ancient traditions of their bitterly sadistic inhuman ancestors. Take pleasure in shaping raggedy voodoo dolls slowly torturing the vulnerable unfortunate souls. Using dark black magic as their ultimate source to eradicate peacefulness from morals.
quotes.author: Farah Soufan

quotes.quote: Voodoo is not some kind of black magic cult. It's the distillation of very profound religious ideas that came over during the tragic era of slavery.
quotes.author: Wade Davis

quotes.quote: There's also the tradition of voodoo, the Haitian magic arts, in New Orleans. And because New Orleans is below sea level, when they bury people in New Orleans, it's mostly above ground. So you have this idea that the spirits are more accessible and can access you more easily because they're not even buried.
quotes.author: Sam Trammell

quotes.quote: I have learned a great deal from other Witches, Wiccans, Odinists, Voodoo and Hoodou practitioners, Druids and many others who consider themselves Pagan. The one common thread is that every single person has been nonjudgmental. Isn’t this what it’s all about, acceptance? Are we not here to design our own spiritual path?
quotes.author: Arin Murphy-Hiscock

quotes.quote: The music in Haiti is all tied up in voodoo and African rhythm, and so there's this funny thing: go to a voodoo ceremony, and then go to a Catholic church and tell me which music you liked better, to which one the music is more integral.
quotes.author: Win Butler

quotes.quote: When people think about this religion, they'll say "voodoo" this and "voodoo" that in the way the Hollywood movies show it: the sticking of pins in dolls. It's very different than Vodou - which is a religion that comes to Haiti from our ancestors in Africa. I want to differentiate it from the stereotypical, sensationalized view that we see of the religion.
quotes.author: Edwidge Danticat

quotes.quote: Voodoo is a very interesting religion for the whole family, even those members of it who are dead.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Too bad you can't buy a voodoo globe so that you could make the earth spin real fast and freak everbody out.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Voodoo is very old magic - possibly one of the oldest forms of all time. It's often referred to as vodou or voudoun.... Voodoo worships the loa, which are literally spirits - like ghosts - but much more powerful. The priestess can summon the loa, and the spirit inhabits her body. It's called being 'ridden.
quotes.author: Amanda Carlson

quotes.quote: The 'civil rights' revolutionary groups are a case in point. Their goal is not equality but power. The background of Negro culture is African and magic, and the purposes of magic are control and power ... Voodoo or magic was the religion and life of American Negroes. Voodoo songs underlie jazz, and old voodoo, with its power goal, has been merely replaced with revolutionary voodoo, a modernized power drive.
quotes.author: R.J. Rushdoony

quotes.quote: One thing you can say is that as for the voodoo stuff, no one had ever done anything like that before. The stuff sounds very weird to us. I don't even know if it would make it today.
quotes.author: Michael Hurtt

quotes.quote: In the old days it was called voodoo and they stuck needles in dolls, now it's called acupuncture and they stick the needles straight into the person.
quotes.author: Cathy Hopkins

quotes.quote: Voting is the most precious right of every citizen, and we have a moral obligation to ensure the integrity of our voting process.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: By voting, we add our voice to the chorus that forms opinions and the basis for actions.
quotes.author: Jens Stoltenberg

quotes.quote: If voting changed anything, they'd make it illegal.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Voting is the expression of our commitment to ourselves, one another, this country and this world.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Voting is a civic sacrament - the highest responsibility we have as Americans.
quotes.author: Christine Pelosi

quotes.quote: I believe that voting is the first act of building a community as well as building a country.
quotes.author: John Ensign

quotes.quote: Voting is a right best exercised by people who have taken time to learn about the issues.
quotes.author: Tony Snow

quotes.quote: In most places in the country, voting is looked upon as a right and a duty, but in Chicago it's a sport.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: Voting is as much an emotional act as it is an intellectual one.
quotes.author: Monica Crowley

quotes.quote: Voting is the foundational act that breathes life into the principle of the consent of the governed.
quotes.author: DeForest Soaries

quotes.quote: Voting is fundamental in our democracy. It has yielded enormous returns.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: Voting is an individual, personal thing.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.quote: Touch screen voting is a fine thing so long as they have a voter-verified paper trail.
quotes.author: Joan Blades

quotes.quote: Voting is like alchemy - taking an abstract value and breathing life into it.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Eventually I foresee voting on the Internet, which will lead to much more direct democracy.
quotes.author: Dick Gephardt

quotes.quote: All voting is a sort of gaming, like checkers or backgammon, with a slight moral tinge to it, a playing with right and wrong.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Voting is simply a way of determining which side is the stronger without putting it to the test of fighting.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Voting is easy and marginally useful, but it is a poor substitute for democracy, which requires direct action by concerned citizens.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Get the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
quotes.author: Frank Dane

quotes.quote: Constantly choosing the lesser of two evils is still choosing evil.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.
quotes.author: Origen

quotes.quote: Always vote for principle, though you may vote alone, and you may cherish the sweetest reflection that your vote is never lost.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: It was great that anybody can take part in voting.
quotes.author: Li Yuchun

quotes.quote: The measure of choosing well, is, whether a man likes and finds good in what he has chosen.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Choosing how you vote should not be a snap verdict based on a few minutes of television.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: Choosing one's leaders is an affirmation that the person making the choice has inherent worth.
quotes.author: Linda Chavez

quotes.quote: Young people need to vote. They need to get out there. Every vote counts. Educate yourself too. Don't just vote. Know what you're voting for, and stand by that.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.quote: I went to vote once, but I got too scared. I couldn't decide whom to vote for.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: The most powerful thing we own is our vote.
quotes.author: Bev Perdue

quotes.quote: With the right to vote, our choice should be for the Holy Spirit to lead us and guide us.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: It is the vice of a vulgar mind to be thrilled by bigness.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: The good opinion of theÂ vulgarÂ is injurious.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: To the vulgar eye, few things are wonderful that are not distant.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: TheÂ vulgarÂ mind always mistakes the exceptional for the important.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: VulgarÂ people take huge delight in the faults and follies of great men.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: OurÂ vulgarÂ perception is not concerned with other thanÂ vulgarÂ phenomena.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: TheÂ vulgarÂ crowd always is taken by appearances, and the world consists chiefly of theÂ vulgar.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: TheÂ vulgarÂ only laugh, but never smile; whereas well-bred people often smile, but seldom laugh.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The vulgar herd estimate friendship by its advantages.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: It is quite possible for theÂ vulgarÂ to be funny, but to succeed, it must rise to a certain genius.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: TheÂ vulgarÂ man is always the most distinguished, for the very desire to be distinguished isÂ vulgar.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The manner of aÂ vulgarÂ man has freedom without ease, and the manner of a gentleman has ease without freedom.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: When once you have got hold of aÂ vulgarÂ joke, you may be certain that you have got hold of a subtle and spiritual idea.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It is veryÂ vulgarÂ to talk about one's own business. Only people like stockbrokers do that, and then only at dinner parties.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The insolence of theÂ vulgarÂ is in proportion to their ignorance. They treat everything with contempt which they do not understand.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The mostÂ vulgarÂ slang is scarcely worse than the attempted elegance which those unused to good society imagine to be the evidence of cultivation.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: AÂ vulgarÂ man, in any ill that happens to him, blames others; a novice in philosophy blames himself; and a philosopher blames neither, the one nor the other.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: AÂ vulgarÂ man is captious and jealous; eager and impetuous about trifles. He suspects himself to be slighted, and thinks everything that is said meant at him.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The fundamental flaw ofÂ vulgarÂ thought lies in the fact that it wishes to content itself with motionless imprints of a reality which consists of eternal motion.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: VulgarÂ and inactive minds confound familiarity with knowledge, and conceive themselves informed of the whole nature of things, when they are shown their form or told their use.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: There is aÂ vulgarÂ incredulity, which in historical matters, as well as in those of religion, finds it easier to doubt than to examine.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: The need to be right is the sign of a vulgar mind.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Vulgarity is simply the conduct of other people.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is veryÂ vulgarÂ to talk like a dentist when one isn't a dentist. It produced a false impression.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: TheÂ vulgarÂ refuse or crouch beneath their load; the brave bear theirs without repining.
quotes.author: David Mallet
